Xuqujeꞌ kakibꞌan chꞌawem riꞌ piꞌwiꞌ rumal cher ix kiloqꞌ xuqujeꞌ rumal ri nimalaj toqꞌobꞌ ri ikꞌamawaꞌm ix che ri Dios.
Sibꞌalaj tyox che ri Dios rumal ri usipanik ri man kꞌo ta utzij winaq kakwin chusolik rij.
In in Pablo, qas kinbꞌij chiꞌwach pa ri rutzilal ri Cristo, e kꞌi kebꞌinik chi sibꞌalaj kinxiꞌj wibꞌ kinbꞌij ri jastaq are kinwil kipalaj, are kꞌut are sibꞌalaj naj in kꞌo wi, kꞌi ri kinbꞌij.
Qas kinbꞌij na chiꞌwe, rech jeriꞌ are kinopan iwukꞌ man rukꞌ ta kowil kinenoꞌjin kukꞌ ri kakibꞌij chi xaq pa ri qatyoꞌjal kujnoꞌjinik.
Pune uj kꞌo cho ri uwachulew, man kaqabꞌan ta chꞌoꞌj jetaq ri kakibꞌan ri aꞌjuwachulew.
Ri cheꞌyabꞌal ri kaqakojo kujchꞌoꞌjinik man rech ta uwachulew, xane ri chꞌoꞌjibꞌal ri kaqakojo sibꞌalaj kꞌo uchuqꞌabꞌ pa Dios chutukixik ri chuqꞌabꞌ rech ri itzel.
Kaqatukij ronojel uwach nimal xuqujeꞌ chomanik ri kuqꞌatej ri retaꞌmabꞌal ri Dios, xuqujeꞌ kaqakꞌam bꞌik ronojel uwach chomanik rech kumochꞌ ribꞌ chuxeꞌ raqan uqꞌabꞌ ri Cristo.
Xuqujeꞌ kujkwinik kaqaqꞌat tzij puꞌwiꞌ ri kubꞌan ri winaq ri man kaniman taj, kꞌa chopan na ri qꞌij are iwonojel chik kixnimanik.
Chikaꞌyejmpe ri jastaq ri kiwilo. We kꞌo jun uchapom ukꞌuꞌx chi rech ri Cristo, chuchomaj rij junmul chik: Uj uj re ri Cristo jetaq areꞌ rech ri Cristo.
Man kinkꞌixibꞌej taj unaꞌik nimal jubꞌiqꞌ chi na cho ri qas taqalik, rumal ri kwinem ri yaꞌtal chaqe rumal ri Ajawxel, che itoꞌik, man che ta itukixik.
Man are ta kawaj kixinxibꞌij rukꞌ we nuwuj ri tajin kintaq bꞌik chiꞌwe.
Rumal cher e kꞌo jujun kakibꞌij: Sibꞌalaj kꞌax katzijon pa taq ri uwuj, pune are kaqil chiwinaqil man kꞌo ta uchuqꞌabꞌ xuqujeꞌ are kachꞌawik man jeꞌl taj kataqik.
We winaq riꞌ rajawaxik kakichꞌobꞌo chi junam kujnoꞌjinik rukꞌ ri qatzꞌibꞌam xuqujeꞌ we kujkil chiwinaqil.
Man kaqajunamaj ta qibꞌ kukꞌ nikꞌaj chik ri kakitzuj kibꞌ rech kekamik. Kakijunamaj kibꞌ kukꞌ nikꞌaj chik rukꞌ ri ketabꞌal, man ketaꞌm taj ri kakibꞌano.
Ri uj kꞌut, man kaqanaꞌ ta nimal cho ri yaꞌtal chaqe kaqabꞌano. Xane kaqanaꞌ nimal jetaq ri karaj ri Dios, rech jeriꞌ kujopan iwukꞌ.
We ta mat ujkꞌolinaq iwukꞌ nabꞌe kanoq, wine kibꞌij chi tajin kujikꞌow che ri qas taqalik kaqabꞌano, qas tzij wi uj xujnabꞌej chubꞌixik chiꞌwe ri utz laj taq tzij rech ri Cristo.
Man kaqanaꞌ ta nimal rumal ri chak ri nikꞌaj chik e bꞌanowinaq. Xane kaqayeꞌj chi are tajin kakꞌiy ri ikojobꞌal, kanimar xuqujeꞌ ri kibꞌano.
Rech jeriꞌ kitzijoj ri utzij ri Dios pa taq juleꞌ taq tinimit chik, jeriꞌ man kinaꞌ ta nimal rukꞌ ri chak ri nikꞌaj chik e bꞌanowinaq.
Are kꞌu ri kunimarisaj ribꞌ, chunimarisaj ribꞌ pa ri Ajawxel.
Rumal cher man are ta kachꞌeken ri winaq ri xaq areꞌ kuya uqꞌij chibꞌil ribꞌ, xane are kachꞌeken ri winaq ri kaya uqꞌij rumal ri Dios.
¡Kꞌo ta bꞌanom wi kiniqꞌiꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ, pune kon kinbꞌantajik!
Kakꞌaxir ri wanimaꞌ iwumal iwe jetaq ri kubꞌan ri Dios, rumal cher kawaj xa rukꞌ jun kixkꞌuliꞌ wi, xaq xwi rukꞌ ri Cristo, rech jeriꞌ kixinjach cho ri Dios jetaq jun akꞌal ali.
Kinxiꞌj wibꞌ rumal rukꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ kakꞌexetaj ri ichomabꞌal kitzaq kanoq ri ijeqelem pa Cristo jetaq ri xkꞌulmataj rukꞌ ri Eva, xsubꞌutaj rumal ri kumatz.
Rumal cher we kꞌo jun winaq ri kutzijoj chik jun Jesús ri man are ta ri qatzijom uj chiꞌwe, o kikꞌamawaꞌj chi jun uxlabꞌal ri man are ta ikꞌamawaꞌm o kutzijoj chi ne utz laj taq tzij ri man are ta qatzijom chiꞌwe sibꞌalaj utz kita ri kubꞌij chiꞌwe.
Kinchomaj kꞌut chi man sibꞌalaj nitzꞌ ta nuqꞌij chikiwach ri e nimaq taq taqoꞌn.
Pune man qas ta kinkwinik kinchꞌawik, kꞌo wetaꞌmabꞌal. Iwetaꞌm waꞌ we riꞌ, rumal kꞌi mul qakꞌutum chiꞌwach pa ronojel ri qabꞌanom.
¿La xinmakun kꞌut rumal uyaꞌik iqꞌij are xintzijoj ri utz laj taq tzij chiꞌwe man kꞌo ta pwaq xinta choch?
Qas tzij, xane nikꞌaj komontyox chik xintojowik rech xixinpatanij ix.
Are xinkꞌojiꞌ iwukꞌ xaꞌjawataj jastaq we, man xinux ta jun eqaꞌn chiꞌwe, rumal cher ri aꞌlaxik ri xepe pa Macedonia xkiya ronojel ri xajawataj chwe. Man xwaj taj xkꞌaxir ikꞌuꞌx rumal we, xuqujeꞌ man kawaj taj chi kakꞌaxir na ikꞌuꞌx chwe.
Ri qas tzij rech ri Cristo kꞌo pa wanimaꞌ jeriꞌ man kꞌo ta jun ri kel je laꞌ pa ri tinimit Acaya kinuqꞌatej rech mat kinnimarisaj wibꞌ.
¿Jas che jewaꞌ kinbꞌij? ¿La xa kꞌu rumal man kixinloqꞌaj taj? Ri Dios retaꞌm chi qas kixinloqꞌaj wi.
Kinwilij kꞌu na ubꞌanik ri tajin kinbꞌano, rech jeriꞌ kinwesaj chike ri winaq ri nimal kakinaꞌo rumal cher kakibꞌij chi e junam qukꞌ, kakiya kiqꞌij rumal ri kakibꞌano.
We winaq riꞌ xaq esal taq kiwach ri e taqoꞌn, eleqꞌomabꞌ taq ajchakibꞌ, kakipoꞌ kibꞌ chi e taqoꞌn rech ri Cristo.
Man mayijabꞌal ta waꞌ ubꞌixik rumal cher ri Itzel kupoꞌ ribꞌ chi jun ángel rech tunal.
Rumal riꞌ man mayijabꞌal taj chi ri e patanijelabꞌ kakipoꞌ kibꞌ rech jer kebꞌantaj patanijelabꞌ rech sukꞌal. Kꞌisbꞌal kꞌu rech ronojel kakikꞌamawaꞌj na ri utojbꞌalil ri itzel taq kichak.
Junmul chik kinbꞌij: Man kꞌo ta bꞌa jun kubꞌij chwe chi xa in kon, o pa juleꞌ taq tzij chik chinikꞌamawaꞌj pune in kon, rech jeriꞌ kinnaꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ nimal.
Man are tajin kinbꞌij ri karaj ri Ajawxel, xane man rukꞌ ta etaꞌmabꞌal tajin kinbꞌij, xaq xwi kawaj kinya nuqꞌij chibꞌil wibꞌ.
Rumal cher sibꞌalaj e kꞌi kakinimarisaj kibꞌ pa ri kityoꞌjal, ri in xuqujeꞌ je kinbꞌano.
Rumal cher ix, pune kꞌo iwetaꞌmabꞌal, kiꞌkochꞌ ri man kꞌo taj ketaꞌmabꞌal.
Kiꞌqiꞌ ri winaq, pune kixkibꞌan che kajchak, o kixkitijo, o kakikꞌam ne ri ijastaq, nimal kakinaꞌo, o kixkichꞌay chiꞌpalaj.
Pune kinwesaj nukꞌixibꞌal, kinbꞌij chiꞌwe chi sibꞌalaj ujbꞌaqꞌoꞌtinaq. We kakibꞌij ri winaq chi kekwin chubꞌanik ri jastaq, in xuqujeꞌ kinbꞌij chi kinkwinik kinbꞌan we jastaq riꞌ.
¿La aꞌj hebreo we winaq riꞌ? In xuqujeꞌ in hebreo. ¿La aꞌj Israel we winaq riꞌ? In xuqujeꞌ in aj Israel. ¿La e rijaꞌl ri Abraham? In rijaꞌl ri Abraham xuqujeꞌ in.
¿La e patanijel kꞌut rech ri Cristo? Jer ta ne tajin kachꞌaw jun kon. In in kꞌo na chikiwach. Sibꞌalaj nim chak nubꞌanom chikiwach konojel, man kajilabꞌ taj ri mul inchꞌaytalik, in tzꞌapital kꞌi mul pa cheꞌ, sibꞌalaj kꞌi mul raj in kaminaq.
Jobꞌ mul in raputalik, juwinaq bꞌelej lajuj kumal ri winaq aꞌj Israel.
Oxmul xinkichꞌay rukꞌ cheꞌ, junmul xinkibꞌan che abꞌaj, oxmul raj xinjiqꞌik rumal xtukin ri jukubꞌ bꞌinibꞌal puꞌwiꞌ jaꞌ chinuxeꞌ, xinwikꞌowisaj jun qꞌij rachiꞌl jun aqꞌabꞌ pa ri nimalaj plo.
Kꞌi mul xinxiꞌj wibꞌ. Kꞌi mul raj xinjiqꞌ pa nimaꞌ, xinxiꞌj wibꞌ chike eleqꞌomabꞌ, xinkixibꞌij ri nuwinaq, xuqujeꞌ ri man e nuwinaq taj. Xinxibꞌix pa ri tinimit, xuqujeꞌ pa ri kꞌolibꞌal jawjeꞌ maj wi ja, xinxiꞌj wibꞌ pa ri plo, xuqujeꞌ xinxiꞌj wibꞌ are xinkꞌojiꞌk chikixoꞌl ri esal taq kiwach alaxik,
Sibꞌalaj kꞌi chak xuqujeꞌ qꞌiꞌtajik nuriqom, kꞌi mul man in warinaq taj, nunaꞌom numik xuqujeꞌ chaqij chiꞌ, kꞌi mul man inwoꞌqinaq taj, nunaꞌom tew xuqujeꞌ kꞌo mul man xinriq ta watzꞌyaq.
Man xaq xwi ta riꞌ, qꞌij chi qꞌij kakꞌaxir wanimaꞌ rumal ke ri komontyox.
¿La xaq xwi kꞌu ri ix kixyawajik? In xuqujeꞌ. ¿La man kꞌu kinyojtaj xuqujeꞌ in we kꞌo jun kabꞌan che chi kutopij raqan?
We rajawaxik kinnaꞌ nimal, kinnaꞌ nimal rumal rech ri nubꞌaqꞌoꞌtik.
Ri Dios xuqujeꞌ Tataxel rech ri Ajawxel Jesucristo, ri tewchiꞌtal ri ubꞌiꞌ chibꞌe qꞌij saq, retaꞌm chi man bꞌanoj tzij taj ri kinbꞌano.
Pa ri tinimit Damasco, ri nim taqanel Aretas xtaqanik rech kachajix ri tinimit kech ri aꞌj Damasco, rech jeriꞌ kinchapik rech kabꞌan kꞌax chwe.
Xa pa jun chakach chik xinqasax wi loq pa ri wentaꞌn rech ri tapya rech ri tinimit, rech jeriꞌ man xinqaj ta pa kiqꞌabꞌ.
Qas tzij wi, man taqal ta chwe kinnaꞌ nimal, chanim kꞌut kintzijoj chiꞌwe ri xukꞌut ri Ajawxel chinuwach.
Wetaꞌm uwach jun achi ri kꞌo pa Cristo chi kajlajuj junabꞌ xkꞌam bꞌik kꞌa churox kaj, we kꞌu pa ri utyoꞌjal o man pa ri utyoꞌjal ta neꞌ, man wetaꞌm taj, xaq xwi ri Dios etaꞌmaninaq.
Xuqujeꞌ wetaꞌm chi we achi riꞌ (man wetaꞌm taj we pa ri utyoꞌjal o man pa ri utyoꞌjal ta neꞌ, xwi ri Dios etaꞌmaninaq)
xkꞌam bꞌik kꞌa pa ri jeꞌlalaj kꞌolibꞌal rech chikajil, xutatabꞌej tzij ri man kitzij ta winaq xuqujeꞌ man yaꞌtal ta chike ri winaq kaketaꞌmaj.
Kinkwinik kinya uqꞌij ri achi riꞌ, ri in kꞌut man kinya ta nuqꞌij, xaq xwi kinya nuqꞌij are xaq kinbꞌaqꞌoꞌtik.
Pune jeriꞌ, we ta kawaj kinnaꞌ nimal, utz riꞌ we jeriꞌ kinbꞌano, rumal qas tzij ri kinbꞌij. Kinya kꞌu kan chilaꞌ rech man kꞌo ta jun kuchomaj jun jastaq chik chwij cho ri qas karilo xuqujeꞌ kuto katzijox chwij.
Rech kꞌu man nimal taj kinnaꞌo rumal ri jastaq ri xukꞌut ri Dios chinuwach jer xkoj jun kꞌix che ri nutyoꞌjal, jun utaqoꞌn ri itzel xutaq loq chinuchꞌayik chinupalaj, rech jeriꞌ man kinnimarisaj ta wibꞌ.
Oxmul xinta che ri Ajawxel chi karesaj chwe we riꞌ.
Ri Ajawxel kꞌut xubꞌij chwe: Ri nutoqꞌobꞌ xaqareꞌ chawe, rumal cher ri nukwinem qas tzꞌaqat are xaq katbꞌaqꞌoꞌtik. Rumal kꞌu riꞌ qas rukꞌ ronojel wanimaꞌ kinnaꞌ nimal rukꞌ ri nubꞌaqꞌoꞌtem rech jeriꞌ kakꞌojiꞌ ri ukwinem ri Cristo pa nuwiꞌ.
Rumal riꞌ kinkiꞌkotik pa ri nubꞌaqꞌoꞌtem, xuqujeꞌ are kabꞌix kꞌax taq tzij chwe, are man kaya ta bꞌe kinbꞌan ri rajawaxik, are kintzukuxik rech kabꞌan kꞌax chwe, xuqujeꞌ are kinbꞌisonik, rumal cher are xaq kinbꞌaqꞌoꞌtik, kꞌa te riꞌ kꞌo nuchuqꞌabꞌ.
Are xinnaꞌ nimal, jer xinnoꞌjinik jun winaq ri man kꞌo ta retaꞌmabꞌal, ri ix kꞌut xinitaqchiꞌj rech jewaꞌ kinbꞌano. Rumal cher taqalik chi ix kiya nuqꞌij, rumal man in taj in nitzꞌ chikiwach ri sibꞌalaj e nimaq taq taqoꞌn, pune in man kꞌo ta kinuxik.
Ri chak ri kakꞌutuwik chi jun qas taqoꞌn, xbꞌanik chiꞌxoꞌl, jacha ta ne ri etal, mayijabꞌal taq jastaq ri xkꞌulmataj iwukꞌ ix.
¿Jas xixkꞌexen wi ix kukꞌ ri nikꞌaj taq komontyox chik? Xaq xwi chi man xinux ta jun eqaꞌn chiꞌwe. Chikuyuꞌ we man utz kita ri kinbꞌij.
Qas tzij ronojel chik nusukꞌuman rech kixeꞌnsolij churox mul, man kinux ta kꞌu jun eqaꞌn chiꞌwe che waꞌ, rumal cher man are ta kawaj kinta chiꞌwe ri kꞌo iwukꞌ rumal cher man are ta ri aꞌlkꞌwaꞌlaxelabꞌ kakiyak jastaq rech kakikoj ri e tat nan, xane are ri tat nan kakiyak jastaq rech kakikoj ri aꞌlkꞌwaꞌlaxelabꞌ.
Xaq jeriꞌ qas rukꞌ kiꞌkotemal kinsach ri jastaq we, xuqujeꞌ in kinjarisaj wibꞌ xa rumal iwe. Pune man qꞌalaj taj chi kiniloqꞌaj jetaq ri kinbꞌan in che iloqꞌaxik.
We bꞌa ne jeriꞌ man in jun eqaꞌn ta chiꞌwe, xane rumal sibꞌalaj kachoman ri nujolom rumal ri xinkoj jun kꞌaꞌmabꞌal pa ri ibꞌe.
¿La xa kꞌu xixinsubꞌu rumal ri jun nutaqoꞌn ri xintaq bꞌik iwukꞌ?
Xinta toqꞌobꞌ che ri Tito rech kixeꞌrila xuqujeꞌ xintaq bꞌik ri jun alaxik rukꞌ ¿la xa kꞌu xixusubꞌ ri Tito? ¿La man kꞌu xa che jun uxlabꞌal uj petinaq wi xuqujeꞌ junam bꞌe ujbꞌininaq wi rukꞌ ri Tito?
¿Teꞌq piꞌkꞌuꞌx chi ronojel we qꞌotaj ri uj petinaq loq, xaq tajin kaqatzukuj jas kaqabꞌij chiꞌwe? Qas cho ri Dios, pa Cristo kujtzijonik. Loqꞌalaj taq qachalal, ronojel ri kaqabꞌano, kaqabꞌano che itoꞌik.
Kinxiꞌj wibꞌ, rukꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ man kixeꞌnriqa taj jetaq ri kawaj, xuqujeꞌ rukꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ man je ta kinnoꞌjinik jetaq ri kiwaj ix are kinopanik. Kinxiꞌj wibꞌ rukꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ kꞌo chꞌoꞌj kꞌax kinaꞌ chike nikꞌaj chik, oyawal, paꞌin taq ibꞌ, etzelal, tzijtaꞌlik, nimal xuqujeꞌ man tajin ta kabꞌan ri jastaq pa ucholajil, chiꞌxoꞌl.
Kinxiꞌj wibꞌ, are kinchomaj rukꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ kubꞌan chwe ri Dios chi kinmochꞌ wibꞌ rumal iwe are kinopan iwukꞌ, wine kinoqꞌ kumal ke e kꞌi ri e makuninaq kanoq nabꞌe, xuqujeꞌ man kikꞌexom ta kikꞌuꞌx rumal ri ketzelal xuqujeꞌ ri mak kibꞌanom ri itzel taq kirayinik kukꞌ taq achyabꞌ xuqujeꞌ kukꞌ taq ixoqibꞌ je xuqujeꞌ ri kꞌarkꞌatik ri kijachom wi kibꞌ.
Naꞌtaj chiꞌwe chi are urox mul waꞌ kixinsolij. Ronojel jastaq ri xkꞌulmatajik rajawaxik kachomax na rij kukꞌ kebꞌ o oxibꞌ winaq ri qas xiꞌlowik.
Xinbꞌij we riꞌ chiꞌwe are xinopan chukabꞌ mul iwukꞌ, chanim kꞌut kintzalij chi ubꞌixik chiꞌwe pune man in kꞌo iwukꞌ. Kintzalij chi unaꞌtaxik chiꞌwe, are kintzalij chi iwukꞌ man kinkuy ta umak xapachin jun ri makuninaq.
Rumal cher tajin kita chwe chi we kachꞌaw ri Cristo chi nuchiꞌ in. Ri Cristo man xaq ta kabꞌaqꞌoꞌt chiꞌxoꞌl ix, xane kukꞌut ri ukwinem piꞌwiꞌ.
Ri Cristo, pune maj chi uchuqꞌabꞌ are xekebꞌax cho ri jun ripbꞌal, chanim kꞌut kꞌaslik pa ri ukwinem ri Dios. Je xuqujeꞌ uj maj qachuqꞌabꞌ uj kꞌo pa Areꞌ, kujkꞌasiꞌ kꞌu na rukꞌ ri ukwinem ri Dios pa Cristo rech kujkꞌojiꞌ iwukꞌ.
Qas chichomaj rij ri tajin kixnoꞌjinik. ¿La qas ix kꞌo pa ri ikojobꞌal? ¿La man kiwilo chi ri Cristo Jesús kꞌo pa iwanimaꞌ? O wine man kichomaj taj, wine ixtzaqmajinaq chik.
Kinwayeꞌj chi kichꞌobꞌ rij chi uj man ujtzaqmajinaq taj.
Kaqabꞌan chꞌawem cho ri Dios piꞌwiꞌ rech maj jun itzel jastaq kibꞌano. Xane are chibꞌana ri utzilal, pune ujtzaqmajinaq kakaꞌyik.
Rumal cher man kujkwin taj kaqabꞌan qakꞌulel che ri qas tzij, xane are kaqabꞌan ri utzilal pa ri qas tzij.
Qas tzij wi, kujkiꞌkotik che ri ix kꞌo ichuqꞌabꞌ pune man kꞌo ta qe uj; xuqujeꞌ kaqabꞌan chꞌawem cho ri Dios rech kubꞌan chiꞌwe chi kixux tzꞌaqat.
Rumal riꞌ kintzꞌibꞌaj we riꞌ chiꞌwe rumal cher man in kꞌo ta iwukꞌ, rech we xinopan iwukꞌ man pa kowil taj kixinchꞌabꞌej, rumal cher jewaꞌ ubꞌanom ri Ajawxel chwe rech kintobꞌanik rech kixkꞌiyik man xa ta kasach iwach.
Kꞌisbꞌal rech wachalal, chixkiꞌkotoq, chisukꞌumaj ri inoꞌjibꞌal, chikꞌamawaꞌj ri nuyojonik, xa jun chibꞌana, chixkꞌoloq pa jaꞌmaril rech jeriꞌ ri Dios rech loqꞌanik xuqujeꞌ rech jaꞌmaril kakꞌojiꞌ iwukꞌ.
Chiya rutzil iwach rukꞌ jun tyoxalaj tzꞌumanik.
Konojel ri tyoxalaj taq winaq ri e kꞌo waral kakitaq rutzil iwach.
Ri Pablo, taqoꞌn man kech ta winaq xuqujeꞌ man winaq taj taqowinaq, xane rumal are ri Jesucristo xuqujeꞌ rech ri Dios Tataxel ri xkꞌastajisan ri Jesucristo chikixoꞌl ri kaminaqibꞌ.
Konojel ri alaxik ri e kꞌo wukꞌ, kakitaq rutzil kiwach ri e komontyox ri e kꞌo pa ri tinimit Galacia:
Are ri qatat Dios xuqujeꞌ ri Ajawxel Jesucristo cheyoꞌw jaꞌmaril xuqujeꞌ toqꞌobꞌ chiꞌwe.
Ri Jesucristo xujach ribꞌ xa rumal ri qamak rech jeriꞌ xujresaj chuxeꞌ raqan uqꞌabꞌ ri uwachulew rech we qꞌij junabꞌ, are waꞌ ri rayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx ri qatat Dios.
Che Areꞌ yaꞌtal wi kaya ri juluwem chibꞌe qꞌij saq. Jeriꞌ.
Sibꞌalaj kinmayijanik rumal chi aninaq xitzaq kanoq ri xixsikꞌin apanoq pa ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri Cristo rech xitereneꞌj chik ri jer kabꞌantaj jun utz laj tzij chik.
Man kel ta kubꞌij chi kꞌo chi jun utz laj tzij, xane xa e kꞌo chi nikꞌaj winaq ri kakaj kix kisubꞌu rech jeriꞌ kakikꞌex ubꞌixik ri utz laj utzij ri Cristo.
We kꞌu ne kꞌo jun chaqe uj, o jun ángel rech chikaj kutzijoj chi jun utz laj tzij chiꞌwe ri man are ta ri qatzijom uj chiꞌwe, chetzelataj uwach.
Jetaq ri qabꞌim chik chiꞌwe: We kꞌo ne jun kutzijoj jun utz laj tzij chik chiꞌwe ri man are ta xqatzijoj chiꞌwe, qaj kꞌax puꞌwiꞌ.
¿Jas kꞌu kawaj rukꞌ we riꞌ? ¿La are kꞌu kawaj kinqaj chikiwach ri winaq, o rech kinqaj cho ri Dios? ¿Teꞌq piꞌkꞌuꞌx ix are kawaj kinqaj chikiwach nikꞌaj chik? We kinqaj chikiwach ri winaq, man in rajchak ta bꞌa ri Cristo riꞌ.
Wachalal, kawaj kiwetaꞌmaj chi ri utz laj tzij ri kintzijoj in, man winaq taj tikowinaq loq.
Man rukꞌ ta winaq xinwetaꞌmaj wi xuqujeꞌ man che ta winaq xinkꞌamawaꞌj wi, xane tzi are ri Jesucristo xkꞌutuw chinuwach.
Jeriꞌ rumal iwetaꞌm jas jeꞌ kinnoꞌjin kanoq nabꞌe are in kꞌo chikixoꞌl ri winaq aꞌj Israel, are xwaj xinbꞌan kꞌax che ri ukomontyox ri Dios, rech kakꞌis puꞌwiꞌ.
Are xinkꞌojiꞌ kukꞌ ri winaq aꞌj Israel in kꞌo na chikiwach ri e wachiꞌl pa ri nukojobꞌal, qas nim xinbꞌan chi rilik ri kinaqꞌatajibꞌal ri nutat nunan.
Pune jeriꞌ, ri Dios xinuchaꞌo are in kꞌo chupam ri nunan, xinusikꞌij apanoq pa ri utoqꞌobꞌ.
Xuqꞌalajisaj ri Ukꞌojol chinuwach rech jeriꞌ kintzijoj chike ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj, man nabꞌe taj xinta che jachinaq.
Man xinpaqiꞌ ta xuqujeꞌ pa Jerusalén chutayik chike ri e nabꞌe taq taqoꞌn chinuwach, xane xintzalij pa Arabia, kꞌa te riꞌ xineꞌ chik pa Damasco.
Are xikꞌow oxibꞌ junabꞌ, kꞌa te riꞌ xinpaqiꞌ pa Jerusalén xeꞌnsolij ri Pedro, xinkanaj kan rukꞌ oꞌlajuj qꞌij.
Man xinwil ta chi jun chike ri e taqoꞌn chilaꞌ xaq xwi ri Jacobo ri rachalal ri Ajawxel Jesús.
Qas karil ri Dios chi man bꞌanoj tzij ta ri tajin kinbꞌij chiꞌwe.
Kꞌa te riꞌ xineꞌ pa taq ri tinimit rech Siria xuqujeꞌ Cilicia.
Ri e komontyox kꞌut ri e kꞌo pa Cristo je laꞌ pa Judea man ketaꞌm ta nuwach che riꞌ.
Xwi kitom ri kakibꞌij ri winaq: Ri achi ri xubꞌan kan kꞌax chaqe nabꞌe, kutzijoj chi ri kojobꞌal ri xraj xuchup uwach.
Kakiya kꞌu uqꞌij ri Dios rumal we.
Are xikꞌow kajlajuj junabꞌ, xinpaqiꞌ chik junmul pa ri tinimit Jerusalén, wachiꞌl ri Bernabé, xuqujeꞌ ri Tito.
Xineꞌ pa Jerusalén rumal ri xinnimaj ri jun qꞌalajisanik ri xkꞌut chinuwach. Xqamulij kꞌu qibꞌ kukꞌ ri qas e kꞌamal taq bꞌe, xintzijoj kꞌut chike ri utz laj tzij ri tajin kintzijoj chike ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj, rech kinto jas kakibꞌij, rech jeriꞌ man xaq ta tzaqel ri nubꞌanom.
Ri e kꞌamal taq bꞌe kꞌut, man xkitaqchiꞌj ta ne ri Tito ri bꞌenaq wukꞌ, chukojik ri retal ri chꞌekom tzij pa ri utyoꞌjal, pune ketaꞌm chi man aj Israel taj.
Pune e kꞌo jujun chilaꞌ ri xaq esal taq kiwach alaxik, xaq xwi keꞌkilaꞌ jas ri kujkwinik kaqabꞌano pa Cristo, rech jeriꞌ kujkitaqchiꞌj chubꞌanik ri kubꞌij ri taqanik rech ri Moisés.
Xa ta kꞌu ne jubꞌiqꞌ xeꞌqanimaj, rech jeriꞌ ri qas tzij rech ri utz laj tzij kajeqiꞌk piꞌwanimaꞌ.
Are kꞌu ri e kꞌamal taq bꞌe, pune man kꞌo ta kutayij chwe ri kuꞌxik, jeriꞌ rumal cher ri Dios man kuqꞌat ta tzij pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq rumal ri kebꞌantajik, man kꞌo ta chi jun kꞌakꞌ jastaq ri xkibꞌij loq chwe.
Xane qas xkilo chi qas xchilibꞌex wi chwe utzijoxik ri utz laj tzij chike ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj jetaq ri xbꞌan che ri Pedro xchilibꞌex che kutzijoj ri utz laj tzij chike ri winaq aꞌj Israel.
Ri Dios ri xuya bꞌe che ri Pedro rech xux taqoꞌn kukꞌ ri winaq aꞌj Israel, xuya xuqujeꞌ bꞌe chwe xinux taqoꞌn kukꞌ ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj.
Qas tzij ri Jacobo, ri Pedro xuqujeꞌ ri Juan, ri qas kabꞌan ke, xkilo chi qas xinkꞌamawaꞌj wi ri toqꞌobꞌ, xkichap ri qaqꞌabꞌ ri in xuqujeꞌ ri Bernabé chukꞌutik chi uj kachiꞌl chik, rech jeriꞌ kujeꞌ uj kukꞌ ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj, are kꞌu ri areꞌ kebꞌe kukꞌ ri winaq aꞌj Israel.
Xwi xkichilibꞌej ubꞌixik chaqe chi kel qakꞌuꞌx chike ri e mebꞌaibꞌ, are kꞌut wa qilim loq ubꞌanik.
Are xulik ri Pedro pa ri tinimit Antioquía, xinbꞌij chupalaj ri kanoꞌjinik, jeriꞌ rumal cher man utz ta ri tajin kubꞌano.
Jeriꞌ rumal are majaꞌ kuꞌlik ri uꞌtaqoꞌn ri Jacobo, ri Pedro kawaꞌ kukꞌ ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj; are xuꞌlik we winaq riꞌ, xuchapleꞌj uqꞌatik ribꞌ chike ri e winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj jeriꞌ rumal xuxiꞌj ribꞌ chike ri winaq ri e kojtal ketal.
Are xkil ri nikꞌaj winaq aꞌj Israel ri xubꞌan ri Pedro, xkikoj kibꞌ rukꞌ pa ri ukawachil, ri Bernabé xuqujeꞌ xutereneꞌj ri kawach laj noꞌjibꞌal riꞌ.
Are xinwilo chi man sukꞌ ta ri tajin kenoꞌjinik jetaq ri kubꞌij ri usukꞌal ri utz laj tzij, xinbꞌij che ri Pedro chikiwach konojel: We at at aj Israel, man je ta katnoꞌjinik jetaq jun aj Israel, ¿jas kꞌu che kaꞌtaqchiꞌj ri man aꞌj Israel taj rech kakibꞌan ri kakibꞌij ri winaq aꞌj Israel?
Ri uj uj aꞌj Israel wi pa qakꞌojiꞌkal, man uj aꞌjmakibꞌ taj jetaq ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj.
Qetaꞌm kꞌut chi man kꞌo ta jun kabꞌantaj sukꞌ che rumal ri chak ri kuta ri taqanik xane xaq xwi kabꞌantaj sukꞌ che jun rumal ri kojobꞌal pa Jesucristo, jeriꞌ rumal man kꞌo ta jun kabꞌantaj sukꞌ che rumal ri taqanik.
We kꞌu kaqaj kabꞌantaj sukꞌ chaqe rumal ri Cristo, riꞌ kel kubꞌij chi qas uj aꞌjmakibꞌ wi. ¿La kel kꞌu kubꞌij wa chi ri Cristo patanil rech ri makaj? Man je ta riꞌ.
We kꞌo jun kuwok chi jun jastaq ri xtukitajik, riꞌ kux chi ajmak junmul.
Ri in kꞌut in kaminaq chik pa ri taqanik rech ri Moisés, rech jeriꞌ in kꞌaslik chuyaꞌik uqꞌij ri Dios.
Xinriptaj rukꞌ ri Cristo, rumal riꞌ man in kꞌas ta chik xaq pa we wi, are ri Cristo kꞌas chwe. Ri tajin kinriq chanim pa ri nutyoꞌjal, kiriqo pa ri nukojobꞌal che ri Ukꞌojol ri Dios, Areꞌ xinloqꞌanik xuqujeꞌ xujach ribꞌ rumal we.
Man kinwetzelaj ta ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri Dios. Jeriꞌ rumal we ta rumal ri taqanik xpe ri sukꞌal, man kꞌo ta bꞌa kutayij riꞌ ri ukamikal ri Cristo.
Ri ix ix aj Galacia, ¡sibꞌalaj man kꞌo taj iwetaꞌmabꞌal! ¿Jachin xbꞌanow chiꞌwe chi man kinimaj ta ri qas tzij, ri xkꞌut chiꞌwach chirij ri Cristo ri xekebꞌax cho ri ripbꞌal?
Xwi kawaj kinwetaꞌmaj: ¿La xikꞌamawaꞌj ri Uxlabꞌal rumal ri chak ri kuta ri taqanik, o xa rumal ri xitatabꞌej ri tzij rukꞌ kojobꞌal?
¿La xa kꞌu sibꞌalaj maj iwetaꞌmabꞌal? Nabꞌe xichapleꞌj pa ri Uxlabꞌal ¿la kꞌa te kꞌu riꞌ kiwaj kitzꞌaqatisaj rukꞌ ri ichuqꞌabꞌ pa ri ityoꞌjal?
¿La xaq kꞌu xiriq kꞌax kꞌa te riꞌ man kꞌo ta kichꞌek che? Pune man kinkoj taj chi mat kꞌo kichꞌek che ri jastaq ri xibꞌano.
Ri Dios ri kuya ri Uxlabꞌal chiꞌwe rech kibꞌan mayijabꞌal taq jastaq chiꞌxoꞌl, ¿la kubꞌan kꞌut rumal ri chak ri kutoqꞌij ri taqanik o kubꞌano rumal ri kojobꞌal ri xikojo chukꞌamawaꞌxik ri tzij?
Jeriꞌ xkꞌulmatajik rukꞌ ri Abraham, xukojo ri xbꞌix che rumal ri Dios rumal riꞌ xbꞌix che chi jun sukꞌ achi.
Xaq jeriꞌ, chiwetaꞌmaj chi ri e rijaꞌl ri Abraham are ri kꞌo kikojobꞌal.
Qas tzij wi, ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik ojer xubꞌij loq chi ri Dios kubꞌan na sukꞌ chike ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj rumal ri kikojobꞌal, kꞌa te riꞌ xubꞌij che ri Abraham: Rumal awe ketewchiꞌtaj na konojel ri e tinimit rech ri uwachulew.
Xaq jeriꞌ ri e kꞌaslik pa ri kikojobꞌal e tewchiꞌtal rukꞌ ri kojonel Abraham.
Konojel ri are kakubꞌiꞌ kikꞌuꞌx che ubꞌanik ri chak ri kuta ri taqanik, e kꞌo chuxeꞌ ri etzelal, jeriꞌ rumal cher ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik kubꞌij: Etzelatajinaq uwach ri winaq ri man kubꞌan ta ronojel ri kubꞌij ri tzꞌibꞌatal pa ri wuj rech ri taqanik.
Xuqujeꞌ man kꞌo ta jun kabꞌantaj sukꞌ che rumal ri taqanik. Jeriꞌ rumal ri sukꞌ winaq kakꞌasiꞌk rumal ri kojobꞌal.
Ri taqanik man rech ta ri kojobꞌal, xane kubꞌij: Ri winaq ri kubꞌan we jastaq riꞌ kakꞌasiꞌ na rumal rech.
Ri Cristo xujresaj loq pa ri etzelal rech ri taqanik are xubꞌan itzel chibꞌil ribꞌ xa rumal qe, jetaq kubꞌij ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik: Etzelatajinaq uwach ri karip cho jun che.
Jeriꞌ xkꞌulmatajik rech xa rumal ri Cristo Jesús, ri tewechibꞌal rech ri Abraham xopan kukꞌ ri winaq ri man aꞌj Israel taj, rech jeriꞌ rumal ri kojobꞌal kaqakꞌamawaꞌj ri tzujtal loq chaqe rumal ri Uxlabꞌal.
Qachalal, kinkoj jun kꞌutbꞌal chiꞌwach: Jun chꞌekom tzij, pune xa rech achi, we xbꞌantajik, man kꞌo ta chi jun karesaj jubꞌiqꞌ che ri xbꞌiꞌtajik xuqujeꞌ man kꞌo ta chi jun kabꞌinik chi man kꞌo ta kutayij.
Je kꞌu riꞌ, ri tzujtal loq, che ri Abraham xbꞌix wi loq xuqujeꞌ ri rijaꞌl. Ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik man kubꞌij taj chike ri e rijaꞌl, je ta ne ri e kꞌo kꞌi, xane che ri rijaꞌl ri kel kubꞌij chi xa jun, are waꞌ ri Cristo.
Ri kawaj kinbꞌij are we riꞌ: Ri chꞌekom tzij ri xbꞌanik ojer rukꞌ ri Dios man kakwin taj ri taqanik ri kꞌa te xpe chi kajibꞌ ciento rukꞌ juwinaq lajuj junabꞌ chuchupik rech man kesax ta uchuqꞌabꞌ ri tzujtal loq.
Rumal cher we ta kayaꞌtaj ri echabꞌal xa rumal ri taqanik riꞌ man kayaꞌtaj taj rumal cher xa tzujtal loq. Ri Dios kꞌut xuya ri echabꞌal che ri Abraham xa rumal ri utzujum loq che.
¿Jas kꞌu xutayij ri taqanik? Xyaꞌtajik rech jeriꞌ kaqꞌalajinik chi man utz ta ri tajin kabꞌanik, kꞌa xpe na ri rijaꞌl ri Abraham ri tzujtal loq chi kape na. Are ri angelibꞌ xeyoꞌwik ri taqanik puꞌqꞌabꞌ jun chꞌawenel.
Xaq jeriꞌ man kꞌo ta kutayij jun chꞌawenel we xa jun kabꞌan rech, ri Dios kꞌut xa jun.
We jeriꞌ ubꞌanik we jastaq riꞌ, ¿la ukꞌulel kꞌu ri taqanik ri utzujum loq ri Dios? Man je ta riꞌ. We ta kakwin ri taqanik, ri xyaꞌtajik, chuyaꞌik kꞌaslemal ri maj ukꞌisik, are ta bꞌa ri taqanik riꞌ kayoꞌw sukꞌal.
Are kꞌu ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik kubꞌij chi konojel ri winaq aꞌjuwachulew e kꞌo chuxeꞌ ri mak, jeriꞌ rech rumal ri kojobꞌal pa Jesucristo, kayaꞌtaj na chike ri tzujtal loq.
Are majaꞌ kape we kojobꞌal riꞌ, uj jatꞌital chuxeꞌ ri taqanik, ujtzꞌapitalik qayeꞌm ri kojobꞌal ri kakꞌut na chiqawach.
Xaq jeriꞌ ri taqanik xpe chukꞌamik qabꞌe rech xujpe rukꞌ ri Cristo, jeriꞌ kabꞌantaj sukꞌ chaqe rumal ri kojobꞌal.
Kamik kꞌut chi kꞌo chi ri kojobꞌal, man xa ta chi kakꞌam qabꞌe.
Iwonojel ix ralkꞌwaꞌl ri Dios xa rumal ri ikojobꞌal pa Cristo Jesús.
Jeriꞌ rumal konojel ri xbꞌantaj kiqasanaꞌ pa Cristo, are xkatzꞌyaqibꞌej ri Cristo.
Man kꞌo ta chi aj Israel xuqujeꞌ man aj Israel taj, man kꞌo ta chi achi xuqujeꞌ ixoq, man kꞌo ta chi ajchak xuqujeꞌ man ajchak taj, xane iwonojel ix, xa ix jun pa Cristo Jesús.
Kamik kꞌut chi ix rech chi ri Cristo, qas ix rijaꞌl ri Abraham, xuqujeꞌ ix echaꞌnel rech ri utzujum loq ri Dios.
Kinbꞌij xuqujeꞌ, ri echaꞌnel are kꞌa nitzꞌ na, xaq e junam rukꞌ ri patanijel ri kꞌo pa ri ja, pune ri akꞌal are ajchoqꞌe ronojel ri jastaq.
Xane chajital kumal ri iꞌlol taq rech kꞌa jampaꞌ katzꞌaqat na ri junabꞌ ri karaj ri utat.
Je xuqujeꞌ uj, are majaꞌ qetaꞌm uwach ri Cristo, uj kꞌo chuxeꞌ ri jatꞌibꞌal rech ri uwachulew.
Are xtzꞌaqat ri qꞌotaj, ri Dios xutaq loq ri Ukꞌojol, ri xkꞌiyik che jun ixoq xuqujeꞌ chuxeꞌ ri taqanik.
Rech jeriꞌ kekꞌam apanoq ri e kꞌo chuxeꞌ ri taqanik, rech kuꞌx alkꞌwaꞌlaxelabꞌ.
Rumal kꞌu che ri ixralkꞌwaꞌl chi ri Dios, ri Dios xutaq loq ri Uxlabꞌixel rech ri Ukꞌojol pa taq iwanimaꞌ rech jeriꞌ kixkwinik kibꞌij: ¡Tat!
Xaq jeriꞌ man at patanijel ta chik, xane at ralkꞌwaꞌl chi ri Dios, jeriꞌ rumal ri Dios xubꞌano echaꞌnel chawe.
Ojer are majaꞌ iwetaꞌm uwach ri Dios, are kipatanij ri man e dios taj.
Kamik kꞌut chi iwetaꞌm chi uwach ri Dios, o pa juleꞌ taq tzij chik ri Dios xretaꞌmaj iwach, ¿jas kꞌu che kiwaj kixtzalij kanoq chuxeꞌ ri chuqꞌabꞌ ri karaj kubꞌan rech piꞌwiꞌ?
Ri ix xaq jeꞌ nim tajin kiwil ri qꞌij, ri ikꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri junabꞌ rech taq ri nimaqꞌij.
Kinxiꞌj wibꞌ are kinchomaj iwij, rukꞌ jubꞌiqꞌ man kꞌo ta xutayij ri xinchakuj iwukꞌ.
Wachalal kixinbꞌochiꞌj rech qas je kixuxik jetaq ri in, jeriꞌ rumal in xuqujeꞌ je xinuxik jetaq ri ix. Kinbꞌij we riꞌ, man xa ta rumal ibꞌanom kꞌax chwe.
Jeriꞌ rumal iwetaꞌm chi rumal rech jun yabꞌil pa ri nutyoꞌjal, xintzijoj ri utz laj tzij chiꞌwe.
Pune kꞌax xiriq wukꞌ rumal ri yabꞌilal ri kꞌo chwe, man xiniwetzelaj taj, xane je xibꞌan chinukꞌamawaꞌxik jetaq jun ángel rech ri Dios, jetaq ta ne ri Cristo Jesús.
Je kꞌu riꞌ ¿jas kꞌu xkꞌulmatajik rukꞌ ri kiꞌkotemal ri xinaꞌo? Qas tzij wi, xinwilo chi we ta xixkwinik, xiwesaj ta riꞌ ri ibꞌoqꞌoch rech xiya chwe.
¿La xa kꞌu xibꞌan ikꞌulel chwe rumal xinbꞌij ri qas tzij chiꞌwe?
Ri e winaq ri kakibꞌij chi kel kikꞌuꞌx chiꞌwe, man tzij taq chi qas are kakaj ri utzilal chiꞌwe. Are kakaj kixkiqꞌat chaqe rech kixeꞌ kukꞌ.
Utz riꞌ we amaqꞌel kel ukꞌuꞌx jun che jun chik, man xwi ta are in kꞌo iwukꞌ.
Alaj taq walkꞌwaꞌl, kinnaꞌ chi junmul qꞌoxom iwumal iwe jetaq ri jun nan ri kakꞌojiꞌ ral, kꞌa jampaꞌ katzꞌaqat na ri Cristo pa iwanimaꞌ.
Are kawaj we ta in kꞌo apanoq iwukꞌ rech qas ko kixinchꞌabꞌej, jeriꞌ rumal qas kinmayijanik rumal ri kixnoꞌjinik.
Chibꞌijmpe ix chwe, ri kiwaj kixkꞌojiꞌk chuxeꞌ ri taqanik: ¿La man kꞌu itatabꞌem ri kubꞌij ri taqanik?
Ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik kubꞌij chi ri Abraham xekꞌojiꞌ e kebꞌ ukꞌojol, jun rukꞌ ri patanijel xuqujeꞌ jun rukꞌ ri qas rixoqil.
Ri ral ri patanijel xalaxik xaq pa ri tyoꞌjal, are kꞌu ri ral ri qas ixoqilom, xalaxik rumal jeriꞌ bꞌiꞌtal loq.
We xtzijox loq riꞌ, jun kꞌutbꞌal, jeriꞌ rumal we kebꞌ ixoqibꞌ riꞌ are ri kebꞌ chꞌekom tzij: jun kape je laꞌ puꞌwiꞌ ri juyubꞌ Sinaí, e kꞌo ral rech kuꞌx patanijelabꞌ, ri ubꞌiꞌ ri ixoq riꞌ are Agar.
Jeriꞌ rumal ri Agar are karetwachij ri juyubꞌ ri kꞌo pa Arabia, are ri Jerusalén rech kamik. Jeriꞌ rumal areꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri e ral e kꞌo chuxeꞌ ri taqanik.
Are kꞌu ri Sara are karetwachij ri kꞌakꞌ chꞌekom tzij, ri karetwachij ri Jerusalén ri kꞌo chikaj, are wa ri qatinimit uj ri man uj jatꞌital ta chik.
Jeriꞌ rumal ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik kubꞌij: Chatkiꞌkotoq at ixoq ri man e kꞌolinaq taj awal pa ri uwachulew, at ri man xanaꞌ ta wi ri qꞌoxom jetaq ri kunaꞌ jun ixoq are kakꞌojiꞌ jun ral; Jeriꞌ rumal sibꞌalaj e kꞌi na ri awal kekꞌojiꞌ cho ri e ral ri kꞌulanik ixoq.
Xaq jeriꞌ Qachalal, uj uj ralkꞌwaꞌl ri tzujtal loq, jetaq ri Isaac.
Are kꞌu ri alkꞌwaꞌlaxel ri xkꞌiy pa ri tyoꞌjal, kubꞌan kꞌax che ri xkꞌiy pa ri Uxlabꞌal, xaq jeꞌ kakꞌulmataj we riꞌ kamik.
¿Jas kꞌu kubꞌij ri Tzꞌibꞌatalik? Chawesaj bꞌik ri patanijel rachiꞌl ri ral, jeriꞌ rumal man junam ta ri kechabꞌal, ri ral ri patanijel rukꞌ ri ral ri qas ixoqilom.
Xaq jeriꞌ Qachalal, man uj ral ta ri ixoq patanijel xane uj ral ri qas ixoqilom.
Ri Cristo xujukiro rech jeriꞌ kujkꞌojiꞌk pa ri kiritajik. Xaq jeriꞌ ko chixkꞌoloq rech makinim ta chi iwibꞌ chuxeꞌ ri jatꞌibꞌal rech ri taqanik.
Ri in, in Pablo kinbꞌij chiꞌwe chi man kꞌo ta kutayij che ri Cristo, we kisakꞌij iwibꞌ.
Junmul chik kinbꞌij chi ri karaj kusakꞌij ribꞌ choqꞌaqꞌ wi kubꞌano ronojel ri kubꞌij ri taqanik.
Ri ix ri kiwaj kabꞌantaj sukꞌ chiꞌwe rumal ri taqanik, man jeqel ta ikꞌuꞌx riꞌ chirij ri Cristo man xikꞌamawaꞌj ta riꞌ ri utoqꞌobꞌ.
Are kꞌu ri uj qayeꞌm pa ri Uxlabꞌixel chi kabꞌantaj sukꞌ chaqe, rumal ri kojobꞌal.
Jeriꞌ rumal pa Cristo Jesús man kꞌo ta kutayij we jun sakꞌitalik o man sakꞌital taj, are kꞌo kutayij ri kojobꞌal ri chakunik xa rumal ri loqꞌanik.
Sibꞌalaj utz ya ibꞌanik nabꞌe. ¿Jachin xixqꞌilowik rech man kinimaj ta chi ri qas tzij?
Man are taj ri Dios kixqꞌatenik, jeriꞌ rumal are ri Dios xixsikꞌin apanoq pa ri kiritajik.
Iwetaꞌm chi jubꞌiqꞌ chꞌam kuchꞌamirisaj ronojel ri qꞌor.
Ri in kꞌut qas jeqel na kꞌuꞌx chirij ri Ajawxel, wetaꞌm chi ix kijunamaj ri ichomabꞌal wukꞌ, are kꞌu ri xaq kixumenkꞌetij, kaqꞌat na tzij puꞌwiꞌ, xapachin na kꞌu ri kuxik.
Qachalal, we ta are kintzijoj chi konojel rajawaxik kakisakꞌij kibꞌ rech kuꞌx sukꞌ, kꞌa te riꞌ riꞌ ketaniꞌ ri na kꞌulel chinutzukuxik rech kakibꞌan kꞌax chwe xuqujeꞌ ri kꞌax ri xuriq ri Cristo cho ri ripbꞌal man kuyak ta chi riꞌ koyawal.
Kꞌo ta bꞌanom wi chi riꞌ ri xaq kixkimenkꞌetij man xwi ta kakisakꞌij kibꞌ, xane chi kakesaj bꞌik ronojel ri kityoꞌjal riꞌ.
Jeriꞌ qachalal, pa kiritajem xixsikꞌix wi apanoq ix. Xwi che ri man kikoj ta ri kiritajem chubꞌanik ronojel ri karaj ri ityoꞌjal, xane chipatanij iwibꞌ chiꞌjujunal rukꞌ loqꞌanik.
Jeriꞌ rumal cher ri taqanik kamulitajik xa pa jun tzij ri kubꞌij: Chaloqꞌaj ri awajil atzꞌaqat jetaq ri kabꞌan chuloqꞌaxik awibꞌ at.
Are kꞌu we xaq jeꞌ kitiꞌ iwibꞌ xuqujeꞌ kitij iwibꞌ, qas chichajij bꞌa iwibꞌ rech man kitukij ta iwibꞌ chiꞌjujunal.
Rumal riꞌ kinbꞌij chiꞌwe: Chinimaj ri Uxlabꞌixel rech ri Dios, man are ta kiwilij ri karaj ri ityoꞌjal ix.
Jeriꞌ rumal ri kurayij ri Uxlabꞌal man junam ta rukꞌ ri kurayij ri tyoꞌjal, we kebꞌ chuqꞌabꞌ riꞌ kakiqꞌatela taq kibꞌ rech man kibꞌan ix ri kiwaj.
We kꞌu are ri Uxlabꞌal kakꞌamow ibꞌe, man ix kꞌo ta chi riꞌ chuxeꞌ ri taqanik.
Sibꞌalaj etaꞌmatal uwach ri uchak ri tyoꞌjal: Are ri kꞌulanem kukꞌ taq kakabꞌ ixoqibꞌ xuqujeꞌ kakabꞌ achyabꞌ, mak kukꞌ taq achyabꞌ xuqujeꞌ ixoqibꞌ, chꞌulujil, rayin makaj pa taq animaꞌaj.
Qꞌijilaꞌn jastaq ri man are ta e dios, qꞌijinik, kꞌax pa taq kanimaꞌ chikij nikꞌaj chik, tzukun chꞌoꞌj, oyawal, paꞌin taj ibꞌ, oyawal rumal cher ronojel ri kakꞌulmatajik,
kꞌax naꞌoj chike nikꞌaj chik, qꞌabꞌarik, nimaqꞌij jawjeꞌ kabꞌan wi etzelal xuqujeꞌ nikꞌaj taq jastaq chik. Qas kinbꞌij kꞌu chiꞌwe chanim, jetaq ri nubꞌim loq chiꞌwe, ri winaq ri kakibꞌan we jastaq riꞌ man koꞌk ta pa ri ajawarem rech ri Dios.
Are kꞌu ri uwachinik ri Uxlabꞌixel are ri loqꞌanik, kiꞌkotemal, jaꞌmaril, ayeꞌnik, utz laj noꞌjibꞌal, kojobꞌal,
mochꞌochꞌem ibꞌ, xuqujeꞌ man kaqaya ta bꞌe che ri etzelal areꞌ kabꞌan rech pa qawiꞌ. Man kꞌo ta qꞌatoj tzij puꞌwiꞌ waꞌ we jastaq riꞌ.
Are kꞌu ri e rech chi ri Cristo, xriptaj kanoq ri kityoꞌjal rukꞌ ri kirayinik.
We are ri Uxlabꞌal yoꞌwinaq qakꞌaslemal, qaya bꞌe che rech kukꞌam qabꞌe.
Maqanaꞌ nimal, xuqujeꞌ maqayak koyawal nikꞌaj chik rech jeriꞌ man kaqabꞌan ta kꞌax chibꞌil taq qibꞌ.
Qachalal, we kꞌo ne jun kariqitaj pa mak, ri ix ri kꞌamtal ibꞌe rumal ri Uxlabꞌixel, chitoꞌ apanoq rukꞌ mochꞌochꞌem rech jeriꞌ kasukꞌiꞌk. Chichajij xuqujeꞌ iwibꞌ, rech man kixtaqchiꞌtaj ta xuqujeꞌ ix pa mak.
Chitoꞌla taq iwibꞌ are kixikꞌow pa kꞌax taq jastaq. Are riꞌ ri qas unimaxik ri utaqanik ri Cristo.
We kꞌo jun kunaꞌo chi nim uqꞌij chikiwach nikꞌaj chik, man nim ta kꞌut uqꞌij, xaq tajin kusubꞌ ribꞌ riꞌ.
Qas chunaꞌ na jun ri kanoꞌjinik; we kꞌo jun jastaq ri karaj kunaꞌ nimal rukꞌ, mujunamaj ribꞌ rukꞌ jun chik.
Chiꞌjujunal chibꞌana ri taqal chiꞌwe kibꞌano.
Ri winaq ri tajin kakꞌut utzij Dios choch, chuya rech ri rajtij ri utz taq jastaq ri kꞌo rukꞌ.
¡Misubꞌ iwibꞌ! Man kꞌo ta jun kakwinik kusubꞌ ri Dios. Ri kutik jun are kukꞌamawaꞌj na.
We are karilij jun ubꞌanik ri karaj ri utyoꞌjal, kukꞌamawaꞌj na kamikal, are kꞌu ri are karilij ubꞌanik ri kubꞌan ri karaj ri Uxlabꞌixel, kukꞌamawaꞌj na che ri Uxlabꞌixel jun alik kꞌaslemal.
Mujqꞌitaj bꞌa chubꞌanik ri utzilal rech jeriꞌ kaqakꞌamawaꞌj na ri utojbꞌalil we man kujqꞌiꞌtajik.
Xaq jeriꞌ, we kujkwinik, qabꞌana ri utzilal kukꞌ konojel, nabꞌe na kukꞌ ri e qachalal pa ri qakojobꞌal.
Qas chiwilampeꞌ, qas in kintzꞌibꞌan bꞌik we tzij riꞌ chiꞌwe rukꞌ nimaq taq tzꞌibꞌ.
Konojel ri kakaj kixkitaqchiꞌj chusakꞌixik iwibꞌ, jewaꞌ kakibꞌano rech man kakiriq ta kꞌax chutzijoxik chi xaq xwi rukꞌ ri ukamikal ri Cristo kꞌo kolotajem.
Ri jewaꞌ kakibꞌij chiꞌwe, man ne kakinimaj ta ri taqanik rech ri Moisés, pune kikojom ri retal ri ojer chꞌekom tzij chibꞌil kibꞌ, kakaj kꞌut jeꞌ kibꞌan ix, rech kinaꞌ nimal pa ri ityoꞌjal rumal tajin kinimaj ri taqanik.
Najtin bꞌa chwe ri nimal, xwi chinnaꞌ nimal pa ri ukamikal ri Cristo cho ri ripbꞌal. Tyox che ri ukamikal, man kꞌo ta chi kutayij ri kuchomaj ri uwachulew chwij in, je ta ne in kaminaq chik pa we uwachulew riꞌ.
Man kꞌo ta kutayij we ukojom jun ri retal ri chꞌekom tzij pa ri utyoꞌjal o man ukojom taj. Are kꞌo kutayij we kꞌakꞌ winaq chi jun.
Kikꞌamawaꞌj jaꞌmaril che ri Dios konojel ri kakinimaj we noꞌjibꞌal xuqujeꞌ ri utinimit ri Dios. Israel are waꞌ ri qas utinimit ri Dios.
Man kꞌo ta chi bꞌa jun kukꞌam loq kꞌax pa ri nutyoꞌjal, jeriꞌ rumal pa ri nutyoꞌjal kꞌo ri usokotajik ri Cristo.
Qachalal, are bꞌa ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri Ajawxel Jesucristo kanaj kanoq pa ri iwanimaꞌ. Jeriꞌ.
Ri Pablo, taqoꞌn rech ri Cristo Jesús rumal ri urayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx ri Dios, chike ri e tyoxalaj taq winaq ri jeqel kikꞌuꞌx pa Cristo Jesús, ri e kꞌo pa ri tinimit Éfeso.
Chikꞌamawaꞌj toqꞌobꞌ xuqujeꞌ jaꞌmaril che ri Tataxel Dios xuqujeꞌ ri Ajawxel Jesucristo.
Tewchiꞌtal ri ubꞌiꞌ ri Dios, Tataxel rech ri Ajawxel Jesucristo, ri ujutewechiꞌm rukꞌ ronojel tewechibꞌal pa ri uxlabꞌal pa Cristo Jesús, pa ri chikajil kꞌolibꞌal.
Rumal cher ri Areꞌ xujuchaꞌo are majaꞌ katiktaj loq ri uwachulew, rech kujux tyoxalaj taq winaq xuqujeꞌ chꞌajchꞌoj cho Areꞌ. Pa ri loqꞌanik
xujuchꞌa loq, rech kujok che ralkꞌwaꞌl xa rumal ri Jesucristo, rumal ri sibꞌalaj utz laj rayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx,
rech kaqaqꞌijilaꞌj ri juluwem rech ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri xuya chaqe rumal ri loqꞌalaj Ukꞌojol.
Pa Areꞌ xujtortaj wi rumal ri ukikꞌel, xkuyutaj ri qamak rumal ri uqꞌinomal ri utoqꞌobꞌ.
Ri xutixtobꞌisaj la pa qawiꞌ, rukꞌ ronojel noꞌjibꞌal xuqujeꞌ chomanik.
Xuqujeꞌ xukꞌut chiqawach ri awatal loq najtir ojer, pa ri rutzilal, uchomam loq ubꞌanik qukꞌ we rayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx riꞌ.
Xuchomaj loq unukꞌikꞌ pa areꞌ ronojel ri jastaq rech uwachulew xuqujeꞌ ri jastaq rech chikajil.
Pa Cristo xuqujeꞌ xqakꞌamawaꞌj ri echabꞌal, rumal cher ojer xujchaꞌ loq, jacha ri uchomanik ri kakwin chubꞌanik ronojel ri jastaq, jeꞌ jas ri kurayibꞌej ukꞌuꞌx.
Rech ri uj ri uj nabꞌe chuyaꞌik ri qakuꞌlibꞌal kꞌuꞌx chirij ri Cristo kaqaya qꞌijilaꞌnem che ri ujuluwem.
Ri ix xuqujeꞌ, are xita ri utz laj tzij rech ri qas tzij, ri utz laj tzij re koltajem, xkoj iwetal rumal ri Tyoxalaj Uxlabꞌixel, ri bꞌiꞌtal kanoq,
are waꞌ ri naꞌtabꞌal re ri qechabꞌal, kꞌa jampaꞌ kuꞌriqa qꞌij rech ri kolotajem rech kaqꞌijilaꞌtaj ri ujuluwem.
Rumal kꞌu ri, are xinta ri ikojobꞌal pa Cristo Jesús, xuqujeꞌ ri kibꞌan chi kiloqꞌaxik ri tyoxalaj taq winaq,
man intanalinaq ta che utyoxixik che ri Ajawxel piꞌwiꞌ pa ri nuchꞌawem ri kinbꞌano,
kinta che ri Dios, Tataxel rech ri Ajawxel Jesucristo, Tataxel rech juluwem chuya iwetaꞌmabꞌal pa ri uxlabꞌixel xuqujeꞌ chuqꞌalajisaj chiꞌwach pa jun jeꞌlalaj etaꞌmanik.
Xuqujeꞌ kinbꞌan chꞌawem piꞌwiꞌ rech kajaqataj ri ibꞌoqꞌoch rech kiwetaꞌmaj jas ri kuꞌlibꞌal kuꞌx rech ri sikꞌinik, xuqujeꞌ jas ri qꞌinomal rech ri echabꞌal ri yaꞌtal chike ri tyoxalaj taq winaq.
Xuqujeꞌ ri sibꞌalaj nim utoqꞌobꞌ qukꞌ uj ri kujkojon che. Are riꞌ nimalaj chuqꞌabꞌ rech ri ukwinem.
Ri xubꞌan chak are xuwaꞌjilisaj ri Cristo chikixoꞌl ri kaminaqibꞌ, xuqujeꞌ xutꞌuyubꞌaꞌ pa ri uwiqiqꞌabꞌ pa ri chikajil kꞌolibꞌal.
Xuqujeꞌ xya taqanik pa uqꞌabꞌ pa kiwiꞌ konojel ri e taqanelabꞌ cho ri uwachulew, pa kiwiꞌ ronojel kwinem, xuqujeꞌ ronojel taqanik pa kiwiꞌ ronojel bꞌiꞌaj, man xaq xwi ta pa we qꞌotaj re kamik, xane xuqujeꞌ ri kape na.
Ri Dios xuya ronojel ri jastaq chuxeꞌ raqan uqꞌabꞌ ri Cristo, xuqujeꞌ xubꞌan che chi xux ujolom ri komontyox.
Rumal cher ri komontyox are utyoꞌjal ri Cristo, xuqujeꞌ are ri Cristo kayoꞌw ronojel ri jastaq ri kajawatajik, pa ronojel qꞌotaj.
Areꞌ xyoꞌw ikꞌaslemal are ix kaminaq kanoq pa taq ri iwetzelal xuqujeꞌ ri imak.
Che riꞌ are je xixnoꞌjinik jetaq ri karaj ri uwachulew are xibꞌan rech ri kataqan pa ri qꞌequꞌmal, jeꞌ jas ri uxlabꞌal ri kataqan pa kanimaꞌ ri winaq ri man keniman ta che ri Dios.
Qonojel je xujnoꞌjin kan nabꞌe, are xqabꞌan ri karaj ri qatyoꞌjal are xqabꞌan ri itzel taq qarayinik. Uj ralkꞌwaꞌl oyawal jetaq ri nikꞌaj winaq chik ri maj Dios kukꞌ.
Ri Dios kꞌut rumal ri jeꞌlalaj utoqꞌobꞌsan wach xuqujeꞌ ri uloqꞌanik chaqe,
pune uj kaminaq pa ri qamak xuya qakꞌaslemal are kaminaq junam rukꞌ ri Cristo, xa rumal ri toqꞌobꞌ xixkolotajik.
Xujukꞌastajisaj xuqujeꞌ rukꞌ Areꞌ, kꞌa te riꞌ xujutꞌuyubꞌa pa ri chikajil kꞌolibꞌal pa Cristo Jesús,
rech pa ri qꞌotaj ri petinaq kukꞌut na ri ujeꞌlal ri unimal ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri xutixixej pa qawiꞌ pa Cristo Jesús.
Xaq pa toqꞌobꞌ xixkolotajik, rumal ri ikojobꞌal, man rukꞌ ta ichuqꞌabꞌ, xane xaq usipanik ri Dios.
Man rumal ta chak rech maj jun kunaꞌ nimal.
Rumal cher are ri Dios xujtikowik pa Cristo Jesús, rech kaqabꞌan utza taq chak, ri rajawam loq ri Dios ojer.
Xaq jeriꞌ naꞌtaj chiꞌwe chi ri ix man ix aꞌj Israel taj, man kojtal ta iwetal, jeriꞌ kakibꞌij chiꞌwe ri winaq ri kojtal ketal are wa ri bꞌantal rukꞌ uqꞌabꞌ winaq.
Che ri qꞌotaj riꞌ naj ix kꞌo wi che ri Cristo, man ix aꞌj Israel taj, naj ix kꞌo wi che ri bꞌiꞌtal kanoq, maj ikuꞌlibꞌal kuꞌx xuqujeꞌ man kꞌo ta ri Dios iwukꞌ.
Kamik kꞌut pa Cristo ix ri naj ix kꞌo wi kanoq xixkꞌam apanoq rumal ri ukikꞌel ri Cristo.
Rumal cher are qajaꞌmaril ri Cristo, rumal xa jun xubꞌan chike ri e kebꞌ tinimit, xuwulij ri qꞌatebꞌal ri xaq kukoj chꞌoꞌj chikixoꞌl.
Xuchup ri qꞌatoj tzij ri kubꞌan ri taqanik xubꞌan jaꞌmaril chikixoꞌl ri kebꞌ tinimit, rumal xraj xubꞌan xa jun kꞌakꞌ tinimit chike, rech jeriꞌ xujeqebꞌa ri jaꞌmaril.
Rech kuꞌtzir rukꞌ ri Dios kikobꞌchal tinimit, pa jun tyoꞌjal cho ri ripbꞌal, jawjeꞌ ri xukamisaj wi ri bꞌanoj kꞌulel.
Xpetik xulutzijoj jaꞌmaril chiꞌwe ri naj ix kꞌo wi, xuqujeꞌ chike ri naqaj e kꞌo wi.
Rumal cher rumal ri Cristo yaꞌtal bꞌe chaqe kujok rukꞌ ri Tataxel rukꞌ ri utobꞌanik ri Uxlabꞌixel.
Rumal riꞌ etaꞌmatal chi iwach, man naj ta chik kixpe wi, xane xa ix jun chi kukꞌ ri winaq ri e chaꞌtal rumal ri Dios, ix tyoxalaj taq winaq ix kachiꞌl ri uwinaq ri Dios.
Chixkꞌol puꞌwiꞌ ri takꞌalibꞌal ri xkikoj ri e taqoꞌn xuqujeꞌ ri qꞌalajisal taq utzij ri Dios. We abꞌaj ri qas kꞌo kutayij are Jesús.
Ri ja ri takꞌal pa Cristo sibꞌalaj utz bꞌantal che uyakik, tajin kawaꞌjilik rech kux jun templo qꞌijilaꞌbꞌal rech ri Ajawxel.
Ix xuqujeꞌ kixyak pa Cristo rech kixux rachoch ri Uxlabꞌixel rech ri Dios.
Rumal kꞌu waꞌ, in in Pablo, in kꞌo pa cheꞌ rumal iloqꞌaxik ix ri man ix aꞌj Israel taj.
Iwetaꞌm waꞌ chi ri Dios xroqxaꞌnij chwe utzijoxik ri uchomanik ri Dios chiꞌwe pa ri utoqꞌobꞌ.
Ri Dios are xkꞌutuw chinuwach ri awatal loq, jetaq ri nutzꞌibꞌam kan chiꞌwe.
Are kisikꞌij uwach ri xintzꞌibꞌaj chiꞌwe, kiwetaꞌmaj na jas ri uchomanik ri Dios chrij ri Cristo ri man etaꞌmatal ta kan nabꞌe.
Are waꞌ, ri xawax loq chikiwach ri winaq ojer, kamik kꞌut tajin kakꞌut chikiwach ri e tyoxalaj taq taqoꞌn rech ri Dios. Xuqujeꞌ ri e qꞌalajisal taq utzij ri Dios rumal ri Uxlabꞌixel
kel kubꞌij chi ri winaq ri man aj Israel taj xuqujeꞌ ri winaq aj Israel kayaꞌtaj junam ri echabꞌal chiꞌwe, rumal cher qonojel uj tyoꞌjal rech ri Cristo, xuqujeꞌ iwech junam ri utzujum ri Cristo Jesús chiꞌwe rumal ri utz laj tzij.
In xinux patanil rech we utz laj tzij riꞌ. Are waꞌ ri usipanik ri Dios ri xuya chwe xaq pa ri utoqꞌobꞌ, rumal ri uchuqꞌabꞌ ri ukwinem.
Pune in riꞌ ri sibꞌalaj nitzꞌ nuqꞌij chkiwach ri uꞌwinaq ri Dios, xinkꞌamawaꞌj kꞌu we toqꞌobꞌ rech kintzijoj chike konojel ri winaq rech ri uwachulew ri nimalaj uqꞌinomal ri Cristo.
Xuqujeꞌ kinya uchꞌobꞌik ri urayibꞌal ri Dios, ri awatal loq pa Dios ri tikol rech ronojel ri jastaq, najtir ojer.
Rech katzijox rumal ri komontyox chike ri e chikajil taq chuqꞌabꞌ, ri unimal ri retaꞌmabꞌal ri Dios.
Jetaq ri uchomanik loq, ri xkꞌulmataj pa Cristo Jesús ri Ajawxel.
Rumal ri qakojobꞌal pa Cristo, kujkiꞌkotik rumal xujkiritajik xuqujeꞌ kꞌo kuꞌlibꞌal kuꞌx chaqe rech kujqebꞌ rukꞌ ri Dios.
Rumal riꞌ kinta chiꞌwe chi man kakꞌis taj ta ikꞌuꞌx rumal ri kꞌax ri tajin kinriq rumal iwe, jun utzilal waꞌ chiꞌwe ix.
Rumal waꞌ kinxukiꞌ cho ri Tataxel,
ri tikowinaq ronojel ri kꞌo cho ri uwachulew xuqujeꞌ ri kꞌo pa ri kaj.
Xuqujeꞌ kinta che chi kuya ichuqꞌabꞌ ri Uxlabꞌixel, xuqujeꞌ kwinem ri kape pa ri ujeꞌlal ri uqꞌinomal,
rech kakꞌojiꞌ ri Cristo pa taq iwanimaꞌ kinta xuqujeꞌ che chi kixjeqiꞌ pa ri loqꞌanik,
rech kichꞌobꞌ rij junam kukꞌ ri tyoxalaj taq winaq ri raqan, ri uwach, ri unimal xuqujeꞌ janipa qajinaq ri uloqꞌabꞌal kuꞌx ri Cristo.
Ri kawaj are qas kichomaj ri loqꞌabꞌal kuꞌx riꞌ, ri sibꞌalaj nim cho ri qachomanik, rech kixnoj rukꞌ ronojel ri kꞌo rukꞌ ri Dios.
Areꞌ kakwinik kubꞌan sibꞌalaj nimaq taq jastaq qukꞌ uj, rumal ri uchuqꞌabꞌ ri kꞌo pa qanimaꞌ ri man kujkwin taj kaqachꞌobꞌ rij,
¡che areꞌ yaꞌtal wi kaya juluwem kumal ri winaq rech we qꞌij junabꞌ riꞌ pa taq ri komontyox xuqujeꞌ pa Cristo Jesús, chibꞌe qꞌij saq! Jeriꞌ.
Rumal kꞌu waꞌ in kꞌo pa cheꞌ rumal utzijoxik ri Ajawxel, xa kꞌu kinta chiꞌwe: Chikꞌaslebꞌej jun utz laj kꞌaslemal taqal che ri sikꞌinik ri xikꞌamawaꞌj.
Chimochꞌo iwibꞌ xuqujeꞌ utz chixnoꞌjinoq, man kayakataj ta iwoyawal aninaq, chiꞌkꞌamawaꞌj nikꞌaj winaq chik rukꞌ loqꞌanik.
Chikojo ichuqꞌabꞌ rech xa ix jun, jetaq ri karaj ri Uxlabꞌixel, rumal ri jaꞌmaril ri kꞌo chi ixoꞌl.
Xa jun tyoꞌjal, xa jun Uxlabꞌixel, xa jun kuꞌlibꞌal kuꞌx, are riꞌ ri sikꞌinik ri ubꞌanom ri Dios.
Xa jun Ajawxel, xa jun kojobꞌal, xa jun qasanaꞌ.
Xa jun Dios xuqujeꞌ xa jun Tataxel kech konojel ri winaq, ri kꞌo pa kiwiꞌ konojel, xuqujeꞌ chikixoꞌl konojel, je xuqujeꞌ pa kanimaꞌ konojel.
Yaꞌtal kꞌu chaqe chqajujunal ri toqꞌobꞌ jetaq ri retabꞌal ri Cristo are xujach ri sipanik.
Rumal waꞌ kubꞌij ri tzꞌibꞌatalik: Are xpaqiꞌ chikaj xuꞌkaꞌm bꞌik konojel ri e chaptal bꞌik xuqujeꞌ xuya jaljoj taq sipanik chike ri achyabꞌ.
¿Jas kel kubꞌij waꞌ chi xpaqiꞌ chikaj? Kel kubꞌij chi nabꞌe xqaj bꞌik xuqujeꞌ kꞌa chuxeꞌ ri ulew.
Ri xqaj bꞌik chuxeꞌ ri ulew, are waꞌ ri xpaqiꞌ xuqujeꞌ bꞌik pa ri kaj, chunojisaxik ronojel.
Areꞌ na xyoꞌw bꞌe chike ri winaq rech kꞌo kuꞌx e taqoꞌn, e nikꞌaj chik e qꞌalajisal taq utzij ri Dios, e nikꞌaj chik e tzijol taq utzij ri Dios, e nikꞌaj chik aꞌjyuqꞌabꞌ, xuqujeꞌ nikꞌaj chik aꞌjtijabꞌ.
Rech keꞌkitijoj ri utinimit ri Dios chubꞌanik ri patanijem, rech kawok ri utyoꞌjal ri Cristo.
Xaq jeriꞌ kujux xa jun pa ri qakojobꞌal xuqujeꞌ pa ri etaꞌmanik rech ri Ukꞌojol ri Dios, rech kujux ko pa ri qakojobꞌal xuqujeꞌ rech kujopan pa ri tzꞌaqat etabꞌal rech ri Cristo.
Rech man je ta kujuxik jas ri akꞌalabꞌ ri man xaq ta jun kekꞌojiꞌ wi, kebꞌe jewaꞌ jeriꞌ, rumal ri kꞌutuꞌn ri kaya chike kumal ri e qꞌolonelabꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri winaq ri xaq kesubꞌunik.
Xaq jeriꞌ kaqatzijoj ri qas tzij, rukꞌ loqꞌabꞌal kuꞌx, xuqujeꞌ kujkꞌiyik kꞌa kujux na jetaq ri Cristo areꞌ jolomaj rech ri komontyox.
Rumal rech ri Cristo kakꞌiy ri qatyoꞌjal, rumal cher chikijujunal ri wokowinaq ri tyoꞌjal kakibꞌan ri kichak rech jeriꞌ kakitoꞌ kibꞌ kekꞌiyik xuqujeꞌ kakikꞌamawaꞌj kichuqꞌabꞌ pa ri loqꞌanik, rumal kitiqeloꞌm ribꞌ.
Xaq jeriꞌ pa ri ubꞌiꞌ ri Ajawxel kinta chiꞌwe: Man je ta bꞌa kixnoꞌjinik jetaq ri winaq ri man e kojonelabꞌ taj, ri aꞌreꞌ e sachinaq rukꞌ taq ri kinoꞌjibꞌal.
Qꞌequꞌmarinaq ri kichomabꞌal. Man kakikiꞌkotebꞌej ta ri kꞌaslemal ri kape rukꞌ ri Dios, kowirinaq ri kanimaꞌ, rumal chi man kꞌo ta ketaꞌmabꞌal.
Maj chi kikꞌixibꞌal, xkijach kibꞌ pa ri bꞌanoj taq mak, man kakꞌis taj ta kikꞌuꞌx chubꞌanik ri etzelal.
Man are ta kꞌu waꞌ ri kꞌutuꞌn ri xikꞌamawaꞌj che ri Cristo.
We na kꞌu qas xita ri xtzijox chiꞌwe, chi xaq pa Jesús kꞌo wi qas tzij.
Xaq jeriꞌ rajawaxik kitzaq kan ronojel ri qꞌeꞌl taq inoꞌjibꞌal xuqujeꞌ chiya kanoq ronojel ri xixux kan nabꞌe, rumal cher qꞌayinaq chik ri ikꞌaslemal riꞌ, rumal ri itzel taq irayinik.
Chikꞌexa bꞌa ri ukꞌuꞌx ri ichomanik.
Xuqujeꞌ chikojo ri kꞌakꞌ taq atzꞌyaq rech ri kꞌakꞌ taq noꞌjibꞌal rech ri kꞌakꞌ kꞌaslemal, ri bꞌantal jetaq ri ukaꞌyibꞌal ri Dios, pa ri qas tzij, ri sukꞌal xuqujeꞌ ri tyoxalaj kꞌaslemal.
Man kibꞌan ta chi bꞌa ri bꞌanoj taq tzij, are chibꞌij ri qas tzij kukꞌ taq ri ikꞌul ja, rumal qonojel xa jun tyoꞌjal qaꞌnik.
Man kiya ta bꞌe che ri oyawal kabꞌan rech piꞌwiꞌ. Man kiya ta bꞌe naj kixoyowarik.
Man kiya ta bꞌe che ri Itzel kok piꞌwanimaꞌ.
Ri kelaqꞌ kan nabꞌe, man kelaqꞌ ta chik, xane chakunoq rukꞌ sukꞌal, rukꞌ ri uqꞌabꞌ rech kꞌo kuya chike ri winaq ri e mebꞌa.
Man kibꞌij ta itzel taq tzij. Are chitzijoj jastaq ri kukꞌam la utzilal chike ri ketowik.
Man kiya ta bꞌis che ri Tyoxalaj Uxlabꞌixel rech ri Dios, ri xukoj iwetal are xixkiritajik.
Chitzaqa kan ronojel kꞌaxal ri kꞌo pa iwanimaꞌ, oyawal, yojtajem, raqoj taq chiꞌaj, bꞌanoj taq tzij, xuqujeꞌ ronojel uwach etzelal.
Xane utz chixnoꞌjinoq, cheꞌl ikꞌuꞌx chike ri winaq, chikuyu taq iwibꞌ jacha ri xubꞌan ri Dios xixukuy pa Cristo.
Xaq jeriꞌ chiwesaj uwach ri unoꞌjibꞌal ri Dios, jer chixnoꞌjin utz laj taq alkꞌwaꞌlaxelabꞌ.
Chikꞌaslebꞌej jun kꞌaslemal rech loqꞌanik, jetaq ri xubꞌan ri Cristo, xujuloqꞌaj xuqujeꞌ xujach ri ukꞌaslemal jeꞌ jas jun kꞌokꞌ laj sipanik cho ri Dios.
Xaq jeriꞌ man kibꞌan ta bꞌa mak kukꞌ taq ixoqibꞌ xuqujeꞌ kukꞌ taq achyabꞌ, man kixjiqꞌjat ta xuqujeꞌ, man kibꞌan ta jastaq ri man e chꞌajchꞌoj taj, rumal chi man kataqiꞌ ta chike ri winaq ri uchaꞌom ri Dios.
Xuqujeꞌ mibꞌij itzel taq tzij, tzijitzatik ri man kꞌo ta choqꞌaqꞌ che, qꞌolobꞌal taq tzij, xuqujeꞌ tzij ri kawach kel kubꞌij. Xane are chixtyoxinoq.
Rumal cher maj jun winaq ri kakꞌarkꞌatik, xuqujeꞌ kuqꞌijilaꞌj itzel taq jastaq ri man are ta Dios, ri bꞌanal mak kukꞌ taq achyabꞌ, ixoqibꞌ, karechabꞌej ri ajawarem rech ri Cristo xuqujeꞌ ri rajawarem ri Dios.
Mixsubꞌutaj bꞌa rukꞌ taq ri tzijonem ri maj kupatanij, rumal chi rukꞌ waꞌ we jastaq riꞌ kape ri qꞌatoj tzij rech ri Dios pa kiwiꞌ ri man keniman taj.
Xaq jeriꞌ man kibꞌan ta iwachiꞌl chike.
Rumal kꞌu cher ix qꞌequꞌmal kanoq ix nabꞌe, kamik kꞌut ix ralkꞌwaꞌl ri tunal, je bꞌa chixnoꞌjinoq jetaq ri ralkꞌwaꞌl ri tunal.
Ri uwachinik ri tunal are ri utzilal, ri sukꞌal xuqujeꞌ ri qas tzij.
Qas chiwila bꞌa jas ri karaj ri Ajawxel.
Man kijunamaj ta bꞌa ikꞌuꞌx kukꞌ ri winaq ri kakibꞌan jastaq rech ri qꞌequꞌmal, xane chiꞌtzujuj.
Rumal chi kꞌixibꞌal ubꞌixik ronojel ri kakibꞌan chaꞌwal ri winaq ri man keniman taj.
Xa kꞌu ronojel ri kutunaj ri tunal, kaqꞌalajin na.
Rumal are ri tunal kakꞌutuw ronojel ri jastaq, rumal riꞌ kubꞌij ri tzꞌibꞌatalik: Chatwaꞌjiloq at ri katwar chikixoꞌl ri kaminaqibꞌ, katutunaj ri Cristo.
Rumal riꞌ qas chiwila na ri kixnoꞌjinik, qas chichomaj na jas ri kibꞌano, man je ta ri kixnoꞌjin kon. Xane jer chixnoꞌjin winaq ri kꞌo iwetaꞌmabꞌal.
Utz chibꞌana chukojik ri qꞌotaj rumal cher kepe na qꞌij ri man e utz taj.
Xaq jeriꞌ, man je ta kixnoꞌjin ri winaq ri maj ketaꞌmabꞌal xane chichꞌobꞌo rij ri urayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx ri Dios chiꞌwe.
Man kixqꞌabꞌar taj rukꞌ jastaq ri kaqꞌabꞌarisanik, rumal xaq kixukonarisaj, xane are chixnoj che ri Uxlabꞌixel.
Chitaqchiꞌj iwibꞌ rukꞌ ri Salmos, xuqujeꞌ rukꞌ ronojel uwach bꞌix. Chixbꞌixonoq xuqujeꞌ chixqꞌijilaꞌn che ri Ajawxel rukꞌ ronojel iwanimaꞌ.
Amaqꞌel chixtyoxin che ri Dios Tataxel che ronojel ri jastaq, pa ri ubꞌiꞌ ri Ajawxel Jesucristo.
Chinimaj iwibꞌ rumal nim kiwil ri Cristo.
Iꞌxoqilom chiꞌnimaj ri iwachajilal jeꞌ jas ri kibꞌan chunimaxik ri Ajawxel.
Rumal chi are ri achajilom jolomaj rech ri rixoqil, jetaq ri Cristo are jolomaj xuqujeꞌ xukol ri komontyox, rumal cher are utyoꞌjal.
Jeꞌ jas ri komontyox kunimaj ri Cristo, je xuqujeꞌ ri iꞌxoqilom rajawaxik kakinimaj ronojel ri kakibꞌij ri kachajilal chike.
Aꞌchajilom, chiꞌloqꞌaj ri iwixoqilal, jeꞌ jas ri xubꞌan ri Cristo xuloqꞌaj ri komontyox xuqujeꞌ xujach ribꞌ cho ri ripbꞌal rumal rech
rech xutyoxirisaj, xuchꞌajchꞌobꞌej are xuchꞌajo rukꞌ jaꞌ, rumal ri utzij.
Rech xujach ribꞌ chibꞌil ribꞌ jun komontyox kachuplinik, maj chꞌuluj che, xuqujeꞌ man qꞌuchuꞌch taj, xane tyox xuqujeꞌ chꞌajchꞌoj.
Ri achajilom xuqujeꞌ rajawaxik kuloqꞌaj ri rixoqil jeꞌ jas ri utyoꞌjal. Xapachin ri kuloqꞌaj ribꞌ kuloqꞌaj xuqujeꞌ ri rixoqil.
Rumal maj jun retzelam uwach ri utyoꞌjal, xane kutzuqu xuqujeꞌ kuchajij jeꞌ jas ri kubꞌan ri Cristo che ri komontyox.
Rumal chi uj utyoꞌjal ri Cristo.
Rumal riꞌ, ri achi kuꞌya kan ri utat ri unan, kuꞌx jun rukꞌ ri rixoqil, xaq jeriꞌ ri e kebꞌ winaq kuꞌx xa jun tyoꞌjal.
Chi riꞌ kaqil wi chi sibꞌalaj nim waꞌ we uchomanik loq ri Dios, are waꞌ ri kinchomaj in chirij ri Cristo xuqujeꞌ ri komontyox.
Pune jeriꞌ pa jujunal bꞌa chiꞌwe chiloqꞌaj ri iwixoqil jeꞌ jas ri kibꞌan chuloqꞌaxik iwibꞌ ix, xuqujeꞌ ri ixoqilom chunimaj ri achajilom.
Alkꞌwaꞌlaxelabꞌ, chiꞌnimaj ri itat inan, pa ri Ajawxel, are waꞌ ri sukꞌ ubꞌanik.
Chaꞌnimaj ri atat anan, are waꞌ ri nabꞌe taqanik ri kꞌo tewechibꞌal chiꞌtal loq rukꞌ,
rech utz katelik, xuqujeꞌ kakiꞌkotebꞌej naj kꞌaslemal cho ri uwachulew.
Xuqujeꞌ ri ix, tat nan, man xaq ta kiyak koyawal ri iꞌwalkꞌwaꞌl, xane chiꞌkꞌiyisaj xuqujeꞌ chiꞌpixabꞌaj pa ri utzij ri Ajawxel.
Ri ix, ajchakibꞌ, chiꞌnimaj ri ajchoqꞌe chak rech uwachulew rukꞌ mochꞌochꞌem, rukꞌ sukꞌal rech ri iwanimaꞌ jacha kibꞌan che ri Cristo.
Man xwi ta kiꞌnimaj are tajin kixkikaꞌyej kixchakunik, jacha ri kakibꞌan ri winaq ri xwi kakaj keqaj chikiwach ri winaq, xane je chixnoꞌjinoq ajchakibꞌ rech ri Cristo, chibꞌana ronojel ri jastaq ri karaj ri Dios.
Chixpatanijoq rukꞌ ronojel iwanimaꞌ, iwetaꞌm chi are kipatanij ri Dios man are ta ri winaq.
Iwetaꞌm chi ri Dios kutoj na ukꞌaxelal chiꞌwe pa ijujunal rumal ri utzilal ri kibꞌano we ix ajchakibꞌ o wine ix patrón.
Ri ix xuqujeꞌ, ri ix patrón, utz chibꞌana chike ri iwajchakibꞌ, man xaq ta kꞌax kibꞌan chike. Naꞌtaj chiꞌwe, xa jun iwajaw kꞌo pa ri kaj, ri Areꞌ man xaq ta kꞌyaqal ri kuꞌchao.
Kꞌisbꞌal rech kinbꞌij chiꞌwe, chikꞌamawaꞌj ichuqꞌabꞌ pa ri ukwinem ri Ajawxel.
Chikojo ri chꞌoꞌjibꞌal ri uyaꞌom ri Dios rech man kixchꞌeketaj ta rumal ri Itzel.
Rumal man kukꞌ ta ri winaq kujchꞌoꞌjin wi, xane kukꞌ ri itzel taq uxlabꞌal aꞌjuwo kaj ri kebꞌin pa ri sutzꞌ, ri kꞌo taqanik pa kiqꞌabꞌ, e qꞌatal taq tzij, ri nimaq taq taqanelabꞌ, itzel taq uxlabꞌal ri ketaqan pa ri qꞌequꞌmal cho ri uwachulew.
Rumal kꞌu riꞌ, chiwatzꞌyaqibꞌej ronojel ri chꞌoꞌjibꞌal ri xuya ri Dios, rech are kuriq ri itzel taq qꞌij, kixkwinik kitoꞌ iwibꞌ, kꞌa pa ri kꞌisbꞌal rech ri chꞌoꞌj.
Ko bꞌa chixtakꞌaloq, chijatꞌij ri ipam rukꞌ ri qas tzij, chichꞌuqu ri uwach ikꞌuꞌx rukꞌ ri sukꞌal.
Chikojo che ixajabꞌ ri jaꞌmaril rech kixkwinik kitzijoj ri utz laj tzij.
Xuqujeꞌ chiwukꞌaj ri toꞌbꞌal iwibꞌ rech kojonik, rech kixkwinik kichup ronojel ri kꞌyaqabꞌal rech qꞌaqꞌ ri kubꞌan ri Itzel.
Chikojo ri tobꞌal ijolom rech ri kolotajem, xuqujeꞌ chiwukꞌaj ri sakꞌibꞌal rech ri Uxlabꞌixel, are ri utzij ri Dios.
Chibꞌana chꞌawem pa ri Uxlabꞌixel, chita che ri Dios ri kajawatajik xuqujeꞌ chichilibꞌej iwibꞌ che. Chixkꞌasloq xuqujeꞌ amaqꞌel chiwilij chꞌawem pa kiwiꞌ konojel ri Tyoxalaj taq winaq.
Chibꞌana xuqujeꞌ chꞌawem pa nuwiꞌ, rech are kinbꞌij ri utzij ri Dios, kinya ukꞌutik ri man etaꞌmatal taj chrij ri utz laj taq tzij
Rumal waꞌ we tzij ri in jatꞌital rukꞌ chꞌichꞌ, xaq jeriꞌ chibꞌana chꞌawem pa nuwiꞌ rech rukꞌ chuqꞌabꞌ qas jeꞌ kinbꞌan che uqꞌalajisaxik ri utz laj tzij jetaq ri karaj ri Dios.
Ri loqꞌalaj qachachal Tíquico, sukꞌ ranimaꞌ patanil rech ri Ajawxel, kutzijoj waꞌ chiꞌwe ronojel ri tajin kakꞌulmataj wukꞌ, rech kiwetaꞌmaj, jas jeꞌ nubꞌanom.
Kintaq bꞌi iwukꞌ rech kiwetaꞌmaj jas kujriqitajik xuqujeꞌ rech kayaꞌtaj ichuqꞌabꞌ are kiwil uwach.
Are bꞌa ri Dios Tataxel xuqujeꞌ ri Ajawxel Jesucristo kuya jaꞌmaril, loqꞌanik xuqujeꞌ kojobꞌal chike ri e qachalal.
Are bꞌa ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri Dios, ri man kakꞌis taj, kakanaj kukꞌ konojel ri kakiloqꞌaj ri Ajawxel Jesucristo.
Ri Pablo rachiꞌl ri Timoteo e patanil rech ri Cristo, kakitaq rutzil kiwach konojel ri e tyoxalaj taq winaq ri e kꞌo pa Cristo je laꞌ pa ri tinimit Filipos, kukꞌ ri e kꞌamal taq bꞌe xuqujeꞌ ri e patanijelabꞌ.
Toqꞌobꞌ xuqujeꞌ jaꞌmaril chiꞌwe rech ri Dios Tataxel xuqujeꞌ rech ri Ajawxel Jesucristo.
Kintyoxin che ri Dios are kixnaꞌtaj chwe.
Kinbꞌan chꞌawem pa iwiꞌ rukꞌ kiꞌkotemal.
Jeriꞌ rumal ixkꞌolinaq loq pa ri utz laj utzij ri Dios xchapleꞌtaj loq are xixkojonik kꞌa pa taq we qꞌij kamik riꞌ.
Qas uchapom na kꞌuꞌx chi ri majininaq loq ri utz laj chak pa iwanimaꞌ, kutzꞌaqatisaj na kꞌa pa ri qꞌij rech ri upetibꞌal ri Jesucristo.
Sibꞌalaj utz we jeriꞌ kinchoman in chiꞌwe, jeriꞌ rumal ix kꞌo pa wanimaꞌ xuqujeꞌ kixnaꞌtaj chwe are in kꞌo pa cheꞌ xuqujeꞌ are in kꞌo chikiwach ri qꞌatal taq tzij chuqꞌalajisaxik ri utz laj tzij, iwonojel kꞌo iwe che ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri Dios ri uyaꞌom chwe.
Rumal cher karil ri Dios chi sibꞌalaj ixnuloqꞌ rukꞌ ri uloqꞌanik ri Cristo Jesús xuqujeꞌ kixinbꞌisoj.
Kinta kꞌu pa ri nuchꞌawem chi ri iloqꞌanik, kanimar na pa etaꞌmabꞌal xuqujeꞌ pa noꞌjibꞌal.
Rech jeriꞌ are kichaꞌ ri sibꞌalaj utz ubꞌanik, xuqujeꞌ kixux chꞌajchꞌoj, man kꞌo ta imak pa ri upetibꞌal ri Cristo.
Xuqujeꞌ rech ixnojinaq chubꞌanik ri utzilal rech jeriꞌ kiya unimal uqꞌij xuqujeꞌ bꞌixonem che ri Dios.
Qachalal, kawaj kiwetaꞌmaj chi ronojel ri xkꞌulmataj wukꞌ xubꞌano chi xnimar utzijoxik ri utz laj tzij.
Qas xqꞌalajinik chikiwach ri e chajil taq rech ri nimalaj ja rech ri qꞌatal tzij xuqujeꞌ chikiwach konojel chi xinkoj pa cheꞌ xa rumal rech ri Cristo.
Tyox chi xintzꞌapiꞌk pa cheꞌ, sibꞌalaj e kꞌi chike ri alaxik ri jeqel kikꞌuꞌx che ri Ajawxel, xkichapleꞌj utzijoxik ri utzij ri Dios man rukꞌ ta xibꞌin ibꞌ.
E kꞌo jujun kakitzijoj ri Cristo rumal cher kꞌax kakinaꞌ chaqe, e kꞌo chi nikꞌaj xa rumal sibꞌalaj utz kanimaꞌ.
Ri kꞌisbꞌal wok kakitzijoj ri Cristo rumal cher kinkiloqꞌaj, rumal cher ketaꞌm chi in in chaꞌtal apanoq chuqꞌalajisaxik ri utz laj taq tzij.
Ri kakitzijoj ri Cristo rumal cher kꞌax kakinaꞌ chwe, man qas ta rukꞌ rutzil kanimaꞌ kakibꞌano, are kakaj katzꞌaqatisax ri kꞌax chwij pa cheꞌ.
¿Jas kꞌu kaqabꞌij? Jas ta bꞌa lo rumal tajin katzijox ri Cristo we kꞌu qas rukꞌ chꞌajchꞌoj animaꞌaj o man rukꞌ ta neꞌ, are waꞌ kayoꞌw nukiꞌkotemal in. Jeꞌ, kinkiꞌkot na rumal rech.
Rumal cher wetaꞌm chi ri ichꞌawem xuqujeꞌ ri utobꞌanik ri Uxlabꞌixel rech ri Cristo, are kinesan na bꞌi waral.
Ri kurayij na kꞌuꞌx are chi man kel ta nukꞌixibꞌal, xane rukꞌ ronojel kuꞌlibꞌal kꞌuꞌx we kinkamik o kinkꞌasiꞌk, kayaꞌtaj na uqꞌij ri Cristo pa ri nutyoꞌjal.
Rumal cher chwe in ri kꞌaslem are Cristo, ri kamikal chꞌekoj riꞌ.
We xaq jeꞌ kinkꞌasiꞌ na cho we uwachulew, xa kꞌa kꞌo na kintayij riꞌ che ri Dios, man kinriq ta kꞌut jachin chike kinchaꞌo.
Ukobꞌchal we jastaq riꞌ utz chwe, kawaj kineꞌek rukꞌ ri Cristo rumal sibꞌalaj jeꞌlik ri kꞌolem rukꞌ.
Xa kꞌu rumal iwe kinkanaj na kanoq cho ri uwachulew.
Qas uchapom na kꞌuꞌx, wetaꞌm chi kinkꞌojiꞌ na iwukꞌ rech jeriꞌ kintobꞌan rukꞌ ri ikiꞌkotemal xuqujeꞌ pa ri ikojobꞌal.
Rech jeriꞌ ri ikiꞌkotemal pa Cristo kanimar na rumal we, are kiwil chinuwach junmul.
Xaq xwi kinchilibꞌej chiꞌwe je chixnoꞌjinoq jetaq ri kubꞌij ri utz laj tzij rech ri Cristo, rech pune in kꞌo iwukꞌ o man in kꞌo ta neꞌ, katataj na chi ko ix kꞌolik pa ri uxlabꞌal tajin kikoj ichuqꞌabꞌ pa ri kojobꞌal chutzijoxik ri utz laj tzij.
Makixiꞌj ta iwibꞌ chike ri kakibꞌan kikꞌulel chiꞌwe, rumal cher ri utz laj tzij kubꞌan na chi kasach kiwach we winaq riꞌ, are kꞌu chiꞌwe ix ri utz laj tzij are jun kꞌutbꞌal re ri kolotajem ri kape rukꞌ ri Dios.
Rumal cher ri ix man xwi ta yaꞌtal bꞌe chiꞌwe kixkojon che ri Cristo, xane kiriq xuqujeꞌ kꞌax rumal rech.
Rumal tajin kikoj ichuqꞌabꞌ chubꞌanik ri chꞌoꞌj ri xiwilo xinbꞌan ojer xuqujeꞌ tajin kinbꞌan kamik riꞌ.
We ri Cristo uyaꞌom ichuqꞌabꞌ rech kiꞌtaqchiꞌj nikꞌaj chik, xuqujeꞌ we ri iloqꞌanik kixutaqchiꞌj chukubꞌisaxik kikꞌuꞌx nikꞌaj chik, xuqujeꞌ we iwonojel xa jun Uxlabꞌal ixukꞌaꞌninaq xuqujeꞌ we kel ikꞌuꞌx chike nikꞌaj chik,
chininojisaj che kiꞌkotemal, chijunamaj ikꞌuꞌx, chijunamaj ri iloqꞌanik, xuqujeꞌ chijunamaj ri iwanimaꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri ichomabꞌal.
Mibꞌan jun jastaq rukꞌ nimal o xa rumal kiwaj kitzukuj chꞌoꞌj, xane chibꞌana rukꞌ mochꞌochꞌem, chiꞌwilaꞌ chi are e nimaꞌq ri nikꞌaj chik chiꞌwach.
Man xwi ta kiwilij ri jastaq ri kajawataj chiꞌwe ix pa ijujunal, xane chiwila xuqujeꞌ ri kirajawaxik ri nikꞌaj chik.
Ri inoꞌjibꞌal rajawaxik je kuxik jetaq ri rech ri Cristo Jesús,
ri areꞌ, pune are Dios, man xukoj ta uchuqꞌabꞌ chubꞌixik chi tzi are wi Dios.
Xane xubꞌan nitzꞌ chibꞌil ribꞌ jeꞌ jas jun ajchak, xalax pa ri uwachulew jetaq jun winaq, xuqujeꞌ xubꞌan achi chibꞌil ribꞌ.
Are xubꞌan achi chibꞌil ribꞌ, xumochꞌ ribꞌ, xnimanik xeꞌ kꞌa pa ri kamikal, kamikal cho ri ripbꞌal.
Rumal riꞌ, ri Dios xuya nimalaj uqꞌij, xuya ri bꞌiꞌaj che puꞌwiꞌ ronojel bꞌiꞌaj.
Rech jeriꞌ kakimej kichꞌek choch konojel ri e kꞌo pa ri kaj, ri e kꞌo choch ri uwachulew xuqujeꞌ ri e kꞌo chuxeꞌ ri uwachulew.
Xuqujeꞌ rech konojel kakiqꞌalajisaj rukꞌ ri kichiꞌ chi are ri Jesucristo Ajawxel rech jeriꞌ kayaꞌtaj uqꞌij ri Dios Tataxel.
Xaq jeriꞌ, loqꞌalaj taq qachalal, rumal cher amaqꞌel kixniman chwe, man xwi ta are in kꞌo iwukꞌ, xane are man in kꞌo ta iwukꞌ, chiwukꞌaj ri ikolotajem rukꞌ mochꞌoj ibꞌ xuqujeꞌ rukꞌ nimanik.
Jeriꞌ rumal cher are ri Dios kabꞌanow chiꞌwe chi kixnimanik xuqujeꞌ kiwaj kibꞌan ronojel ri jastaq rech kibꞌano ri urayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx.
Chibꞌana ri jastaq man rukꞌ ta chꞌaoj ibꞌ xuqujeꞌ man rukꞌ ta oyawal.
Jeriꞌ qas ixchꞌajchꞌoj man kꞌo ta imak, rumal cher ix, ix ralkꞌwaꞌl ri Dios, ri ix kꞌo chikixoꞌl ri winaq ri aꞌjmakibꞌ, ri man kꞌyaqal taj kechomanik. Ix kꞌo chikixoꞌl we winaq riꞌ, jetaq ri chꞌumil ri kachuplinik cho ri kaj.
Are chiwilij uqꞌalajisaxik ri tzij rech kꞌaslemal. Rech jeriꞌ are kuriq ri upetibꞌal ri Cristo, kakiꞌkot na kꞌuꞌx are kinwetaꞌmaj chi man xaq ta xintzaq ri nuchuqꞌabꞌ, xuqujeꞌ man xaq ta xinchakun chi jeriꞌ.
Pune kesax na ri nukꞌaslemal xuqujeꞌ katzuj na jetaq jun sipanik xa rumal ri ikojobꞌal, kinkiꞌkotik na riꞌ xuqujeꞌ kawaj chi kixkiꞌkot na ix wukꞌ.
Ix xuqujeꞌ, chixkiꞌkotoq, xuqujeꞌ chiya we ri ikiꞌkotemal.
Kinwayeꞌj che ri Ajawxel Jesús kinkwinik kintaq bꞌik ri Timoteo iwukꞌ rech jeriꞌ kinkꞌamawaꞌj nuchuqꞌabꞌ are kinwetaꞌmaj jas jeꞌ ibꞌanom.
Ri Timoteo sibꞌalaj kꞌax ukꞌuꞌx chiꞌwe, rumal cher kixuloqꞌaj jetaq ri kinbꞌan in.
Konojel ri nikꞌaj xaq are kakilij ri jastaq ri kajawataj chike, man are ta kakilij ri karaj ri Jesucristo.
Ix iwetaꞌm uwach ri Timoteo, sibꞌalaj utz ri kanoꞌjinik, ubꞌanom ri patanijik wukꞌ chuqꞌalajisaxik ri utz laj tzij, je ri kꞌo jun alkꞌwaꞌlaxel ri sibꞌalaj utz kanoꞌjinik che ri utat.
Kawaj kꞌut kintaq bꞌik aninaq iwukꞌ, xwi wayeꞌm kinwetaꞌmaj jas kakꞌulmataj wukꞌ.
Kuꞌl na kꞌuꞌx chirij ri Ajawxel chi kineꞌ xuqujeꞌ na in, kixeꞌnwilaꞌ.
Xuqujeꞌ xinchomaj chi utz kubꞌan chiꞌwe we kintaq bꞌik ri Epafrodito iwukꞌ, areꞌ jun alaxik xuqujeꞌ jun tobꞌanel, wachiꞌl pa taq ri nuchꞌoꞌj, are waꞌ ri xitaq loq chinupatanixik.
Ri Epafrodito sibꞌalaj kixubꞌisoj xuqujeꞌ kꞌax ranimaꞌ chiꞌwe xiwetaꞌmaj waꞌ chi yawabꞌ.
Qas ne tzij wi xyawajik, jubꞌiqꞌ xraj xkamik. Ri Dios kꞌut xel ukꞌuꞌx che, man xwi taj xel ukꞌuꞌx che areꞌ xane xel xuqujeꞌ ukꞌuꞌx chwe in, rech jeriꞌ man xnimataj ta ri nubꞌis.
Rumal riꞌ kintaq chi bꞌi iwukꞌ rech kixkiꞌkot chi junmul we chiwil uwach, rech xuqujeꞌ man kakꞌaxir ta chi wanimaꞌ in.
Chikꞌamawaꞌj pa ri Ajawxel, rukꞌ kiꞌkotemal xuqujeꞌ nim chiꞌwila ri je kenoꞌjinik jetaq ri areꞌ.
Jeriꞌ rumal jubꞌiqꞌ xraj xkamik rumal ri uchak ri Cristo, xuya ri ukꞌaslemal rech xubꞌan ri patanijik ri man xixkwin ta ix xibꞌano.
Xaq kꞌu jeriꞌ wachalal, chixkiꞌkot pa ri Ajawxel. Man kinqꞌiꞌtaj taj kintzalij utzꞌibꞌaxik we jastaq riꞌ chiꞌwe xuqujeꞌ wetaꞌm chi utz kubꞌan chiꞌwe ix.
Chichajij iwibꞌ chike ri itzel taq winaq ri jer kenoꞌjin tzꞌiꞌ, ri aꞌreꞌ kakaj kakoj iwetal.
Jeriꞌ rumal ri uj ri uj kojom qetal, kaqapatanij ri Dios pa ri uxlabꞌal xuqujeꞌ man kakubꞌiꞌ ta qakꞌuꞌx pa ri qatyoꞌjal xane nim kaqanaꞌo rumal uj kꞌo pa Cristo Jesús.
Ri in qas kuꞌlinaq na kꞌuꞌx chirij waꞌ we riꞌ. We kꞌo jun kukojo chi kꞌo rumal kakubꞌiꞌ ukꞌuꞌx chirij ri uchuqꞌabꞌ ri winaq, in in kꞌo na cho we winaq riꞌ.
Kojtal wetal chi wuq qꞌij, in aj pa ri tinimit Israel, in rijaꞌl ri Benjamín, qas in hebreo wi, xuqujeꞌ chutereneꞌxik ri taqanik xinkꞌojiꞌk kukꞌ ri fariseos.
Qas uchapom wi na kꞌuꞌx chupatanixik ri taqanik, rumal riꞌ xinbꞌan kꞌax chike ri komontyox. Man kꞌo ta jun kabꞌin chwe chi mat xinnimaj ri taqanik.
Pune jeriꞌ, ronojel ri chꞌekoj kanoq chinuwach nabꞌe, chanim kinchomaj chi man kꞌo ta kutayij chwe rumal cher are nim na ri xubꞌan ri Cristo choch ronojel.
Qas ne tzij wi, man kꞌo ta kutayij ronojel ri xinbꞌan kanoq rumal chi are sibꞌalaj nim na uqꞌij ri retaꞌmaxik uwach ri wAjaw Cristo Jesús cho we jastaq riꞌ.
Rech jeriꞌ kinbꞌan na riqoj ibꞌ rukꞌ areꞌ. Man are ta kawaj kinbꞌan ri sukꞌal re ri taqanik, xane are kawaj ri sukꞌal ri kape che ri Dios pa ri kojobꞌal.
Ronojel xintzaq kanoq rumal retaꞌmaxik uwach ri Cristo, xuqujeꞌ rech kinnaꞌo ri ukwinem ri xukꞌutu are xkꞌastajik chikixoꞌl ri kaminaqibꞌ, rech xuqujeꞌ kinriq we ri kꞌax rukꞌ Areꞌ rech jeriꞌ xuqujeꞌ kinkamik jetaq ri xubꞌan Areꞌ.
Kurayij na kꞌuꞌx kinukꞌastajisaj na ri Dios chikixoꞌl ri kaminaqibꞌ.
Man tajin ta kinbꞌij chi xchꞌektaj wumal ronojel, o man kꞌo ta chi kajawataj chwe. Xane xaq jeꞌ inbꞌenaq, kurayij ri wanimaꞌ kinopanik chubꞌanik ri inusikꞌim wi apanoq ri Cristo.
Wachalal, wetaꞌm chi kꞌamajaꞌ kinopanik jawjeꞌ ri yaꞌtalik kinopan wi. Xwi ri kinbꞌano are chi kasachan kanoq chwe ri xikꞌow kanoq, are kinkoj nuchuqꞌabꞌ chubꞌanik ri kꞌo apanoq chinuwach.
Xaq jeriꞌ inbꞌenaq chinuwach rech kinopanik jawjeꞌ ri yaꞌtal wi kinopanik rech jeriꞌ keꞌnriqa na ri utzujum ri Dios chwe pa ri sikꞌinik rech chikajil pa Cristo Jesús.
Xaq jeriꞌ qonojel ri uj tzꞌaqat chik kaqanaꞌo, xa jun chujchomanoq, we kꞌu jun chi wi kixchomanik, ri Dios riꞌ kuqꞌalajisaj chiꞌwach.
Junam qabꞌana che ri qachomabꞌal japawjeꞌ ri ujopaninaq wi chanim.
Wachalal, are chiwesaj uwach ri kinbꞌano, xuqujeꞌ chiꞌwila ri je tajin kenoꞌjinik jetaq ri qakꞌutum chikiwach.
Jetaq ri nubꞌim chiꞌwe, kinkamulij chi ubꞌixik junmul rukꞌ uwaꞌl nubꞌoqꞌoch, sibꞌalaj e kꞌi ri kakichomaj chi man kꞌo ta kutayij chike ri ukamikal ri Cristo cho ri ripbꞌal.
Kakꞌis na tzij pa kiwiꞌ we winaq riꞌ, rumal che ri are kakiqꞌijilaꞌj ri urayibꞌal taq kikꞌuꞌx xuqujeꞌ nimal kakinaꞌo are kakibꞌano ri kꞌixibꞌal ubꞌanik, xaq xwi kakichomaj rij ri jastaq rech uwachulew.
Ri uj kꞌut, uj rech pa ri kaj, qayeꞌm apanoq ri Kolonel, ri Ajawxel Jesucristo ri upetik chilaꞌ chikaj.
Ri Jesucristo rukꞌ ronojel ri ukwinem ri ukojom chuchajixik ronojel ri utikom, are kakꞌexow na bꞌik ri qatyoꞌjal ri xaq kaqꞌayik, pa tyoꞌjal ri kajuluwik, jetaq ri rech Areꞌ.
Xaq jeriꞌ, loqꞌalaj taq wachalal, sibꞌalaj ixnuloqꞌ xuqujeꞌ sibꞌalaj nimal kinnaꞌ rumal iwe. Ko chixkꞌoloq pa ri Ajawxel.
Kinta jun toqꞌobꞌ che ri Evodia xuqujeꞌ ri Síntique rech kakijunamaj ri kichomanik pa ri Ajawxel.
Kinta xuqujeꞌ jun toqꞌobꞌ chawe at sukꞌalaj wachiꞌl, kawaj kinta chawe chi kabꞌan jun toqꞌobꞌ chikitoꞌik we ixoqibꞌ riꞌ, aꞌreꞌ echakuninaq wukꞌ chutzijoxik ri utz laj tzij, xuqujeꞌ ri Clemente rachiꞌl ri nikꞌaj taq tobꞌanelabꞌ chik ri tzꞌibꞌatal ri kibꞌiꞌ pa ri wuj rech kꞌaslemal.
Amaqꞌel chixkiꞌkotoq pa ri Ajawxel, junmul chik kinbꞌij: Chixkiꞌkotoq.
Chibꞌana ri utzilal rech konojel ri winaq kakilo ri kibꞌano. Man naj ta chik kꞌo wi loq ri upetibꞌal ri Ajawxel.
Makꞌaxir iwanimaꞌ che ri jastaq, xane chibꞌana chꞌawem ronojel mul, chibꞌij che ri Dios jas jeꞌ ri kiwaj, xuqujeꞌ kixtyoxinoq che ronojel ri ubꞌanom.
Rech jeriꞌ kuya na ri Dios ri ujaꞌmaril chiꞌwe, are waꞌ ri jaꞌmaril ri man kekwin taj ri winaq cho ri uwachulew kakichꞌobꞌ rij, are waꞌ ri katoꞌw ri kanimaꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri kichomabꞌal ri e rech chik ri Cristo.
Kꞌisbꞌal rech Qachalal, qas chixchomanoq chirij ronojel ri qas tzij, ronojel ri qas utz kanimaxik, ronojel ri sukꞌ, ronojel ri chꞌajchꞌoj, ronojel ri qas kajoror ubꞌanik, ronojel ri kuyak mayijanik xuqujeꞌ ri yaꞌtalik kaya uqꞌij.
Are chibꞌana ri xiwetaꞌmaj, xito, xiwilo, xuqujeꞌ xikꞌamawaꞌj chwe in, rech jeriꞌ ri Dios rech jaꞌmaril kakꞌojiꞌ iwukꞌ.
Sibꞌalaj kinkiꞌkotik pa ri Ajawxel rumal junmul chik xixchoman chwe. Qas wetaꞌm wi chi kiwaj kixtobꞌanik xa man iriqom taj jun qꞌijal chuyaꞌik ri itobꞌanik.
Man tajin ta kinbꞌij waꞌ chiꞌwe xa rumal kꞌo nurajawaxik, ri in rumal wetaꞌm kakubꞌiꞌ na kꞌuꞌx rukꞌ ri kꞌo wukꞌ.
Wetaꞌm kinkꞌasiꞌk are man kꞌo ta sibꞌalaj kꞌi nujastaq xuqujeꞌ wetaꞌm kinkꞌasiꞌk are kꞌo ronojel wukꞌ. Wetaꞌmam kinkꞌasiꞌk are kꞌo ri kintijo xuqujeꞌ are kinnaꞌ wiꞌjal, we xaq kapulin chi ri kꞌo wukꞌ o man kꞌo ta chi ne ri kinkojo.
Ronojel kinkwinik kibꞌano pa Cristo rumal cher Areꞌ kayoꞌw nuchuqꞌabꞌ.
Sibꞌalaj utz xixnoꞌjinik are kixkꞌojiꞌ wukꞌ pa ri kꞌax ri xinriqo.
Ri ix ri kixel pa Filipos iwetaꞌm chi pa ri majibꞌal rech ri utzijoxik ri utz laj tzij, are xinel loq pa Macedonia, man kꞌo ta chi jun komontyox xuya pwaq chinutoꞌik, xaq xwi ri ix.
Xuqujeꞌ are xinkꞌojiꞌ pa ri tinimit Tesalónica, man xa ta junmul xitaq bꞌik ri itobꞌanik chwe, ri itobꞌanik xinkojo che ri kajawataj chwe.
Man tajin ta kinbꞌij waꞌ chiꞌwe rumal kajawataj ri isipanik chwe, xane are kawaj chi ri Dios karil ri kibꞌano.
Nukꞌamawaꞌm chik ronojel ri kajawataj chwe, xuqujeꞌ kꞌa nim na kꞌo wukꞌ. Jeriꞌ rumal ri Epafrodito xuya chwe ri xitaq loq rukꞌ. Sibꞌalaj jun kꞌokꞌalaj sipanik ri xitaq loq rukꞌ, are waꞌ ri qas kaqaj cho ri Dios.
Are ri nuDios pa ri uqꞌinomal chuya na chiꞌwe ri kajawataj chiꞌwe pa Cristo Jesús.
Che ri qaDios xuqujeꞌ Tataxel yaꞌtal wi ri juluwem chibꞌe qꞌij saq. Jeriꞌ.
Chiya rutzil kiwach konojel ri e tyoxalaj taq winaq pa Cristo Jesús. Kakitaq xuqujeꞌ rutzil iwach ri alaxik ri e kꞌo wukꞌ.
Chikꞌamawaꞌj rutzil iwach chike konojel ri e tyoxalaj taq winaq ri e kꞌo wukꞌ, je xuqujeꞌ chike ri e rajchakibꞌ ri nim laj taqanel ri kel pa Roma.
Are ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri Ajawxel Jesucristo, kakanaj kanoq pa ri iwanimaꞌ. Jeriꞌ.
Ri Pablo uꞌtaqoꞌn ri Cristo Jesús rumal ri urayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx ri Dios, rachiꞌl ri alaxik Timoteo.
Chike ri tyoxalaj taq kojonelabꞌ ri e kꞌo pa Colosas chuya toqꞌobꞌ xuqujeꞌ jaꞌmaril chike rech ri qatat Dios.
Kujtyoxin che ri Dios, Tataxel re ri Ajawxel Jesucristo, kaqabꞌan chꞌawem piꞌwiꞌ,
rumal qatom ri ikojobꞌal pa Cristo Jesús, xuqujeꞌ ri iloqꞌanik chike ri kojonelabꞌ.
Xa rumal ri kuꞌlibꞌal ikꞌuꞌx ri yaktal pa ri kaj. Pa we kꞌulibꞌal kꞌuꞌx riꞌ, ri ix xita ri utz laj tzij re qas tzij, ri utz laj tzij
ri xopan iwukꞌ. We utz laj tzij riꞌ tajin kawachinik xuqujeꞌ tajin kakꞌiyik pa ronojel ri uwachulew, je xuqujeꞌ xkꞌulmataj iwukꞌ ix pa ri qꞌij ri xito xuqujeꞌ xichꞌobꞌ ri qas tzij rech ri jeꞌl laj utoqꞌobꞌ ri Dios.
Jetaq ri xiwetaꞌmaj rukꞌ ri Epafras, patanil re ri Cristo xuqujeꞌ toꞌl qe uj, rumal iwe.
Areꞌ xtzijon chaqe ri iloqꞌanik pa ri Tyoxalaj Uxlabꞌixel.
Are xqatabꞌej rech we riꞌ, man uj tanalinaq taj che ubꞌanik chꞌawem piꞌwiꞌ. Kaqata che ri Dios rech kubꞌano chi rukꞌ etaꞌmabꞌal kiwetaꞌmaj ri rayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx rukꞌ ronojel etaꞌmanik xuqujeꞌ chꞌobꞌonik pa ri Uxlabꞌixel.
Rech je kixnoꞌjinik jetaq ri karaj ri Ajawxel, xuqujeꞌ kaqaj choch ronojel ri kibꞌano. Rech kixwachinik pa ronojel ri chak ri kibꞌano, xuqujeꞌ rech kixkꞌiy pa ri etaꞌmanik rech ri Dios.
Kaqata che ri Dios rech kayaꞌtaj ichuqꞌabꞌ rukꞌ ri jeꞌlalaj ukwinem rech ri ujuluwem. Rech ko kixkꞌojiꞌk, kixayeꞌnik rukꞌ kiꞌkotemal,
kujtyoxin che ri Tataxel ri xuya bꞌe chaqe kaqakꞌamawaꞌj qechabꞌal kukꞌ ri e tyoxalaj taq winaq, pa ri ajawarem rech ri tunal.
Areꞌ xujresaj xeꞌ raqan uqꞌabꞌ ri qꞌequꞌmal xujuqꞌaxaj pa ri ajawarem rech ri Loqꞌalaj uKꞌojol.
Pa Cristo xujtortaj wi, xuqujeꞌ xqakꞌamawaꞌj ri kuybꞌal qamak.
Ri Cristo are ukaꞌyebꞌal ri Dios ri man kilitaj taj. Are nim uqꞌij choch ronojel ri jastaq ri xetikik.
Rumal rech areꞌ xetikitaj ronojel ri jastaq pa ri kaj xuqujeꞌ choch ri uwachulew, ri jastaq ri kiꞌlitaj uwach, xuqujeꞌ ri man kiꞌlitaj ta uwach, tꞌuyulibꞌal kech e taqanelabꞌ, kwinem, e chuqꞌabꞌ xuqujeꞌ winaq ri kabꞌan ke. Xtikitaj loq rumal areꞌ xuqujeꞌ rech areꞌ.
Are kꞌo nabꞌe choch ronojel ri jastaq, xa rumal areꞌ e kꞌolik, are xuqujeꞌ kabꞌanowik chi kechakun ronojel.
Are ri Cristo ujolom ri komontyox, areꞌ majibꞌal rech ronojel, are nabꞌyal chike konojel ri e kꞌastajinaq, rech jeriꞌ areꞌ nabꞌyal che ronojel.
Rumal chi xraj ri Tataxel chi pa Cristo kakꞌojiꞌ ronojel ri Dios,
xuqujeꞌ rumal areꞌ xeꞌrutzirisaj ri jastaq ri e kꞌo cho ri uwachulew rukꞌ ri e kꞌo pa ri kaj, xubꞌan jaꞌmaril chikixoꞌl, rukꞌ ri ukikꞌel ri xtixtobꞌ cho ri ripbꞌal.
Pune ojer ix najtininaq kanoq che ri Dios rumal ri iwetzelal xuqujeꞌ ri inoꞌjibꞌal, ix bꞌanal taq itzel taq chak.
Kamik kꞌut ri Dios, rukꞌ ri ukamikal ri Cristo xixrutzirisaj rech are kixujacho ixchꞌajchꞌoj, ix tyoxalaj taq winaq xuqujeꞌ xa ta ne jun makaj kariqitaj chiꞌwe are kixujach cho Areꞌ.
Rech ko kixkꞌojiꞌ pa ri ikojobꞌal, man kixtzaq taj, rech man kixel ta pa ri kuꞌlibꞌal kuꞌx ri kutzuj ri utz laj tzij chiꞌwe. Are waꞌ ri utz laj tzij ri xito xuqujeꞌ ri tzijotal pa ronojel ri uwachulew xeꞌ ri kaj, are waꞌ ri tajin kintzijoj in, in Pablo.
Kinkiꞌkotik are kinriq ri kꞌax pa ri nutyoꞌjal rumal iwe, xuqujeꞌ kintzꞌaqatisaj pa ri nutyoꞌjal ri kajawataj na che ri qꞌoxomal rech ri Cristo, rumal rech ri utyoꞌjal, are waꞌ ri komontyox.
Rumal we komontyox riꞌ xinux patanijel rech ri Dios rumal iwe, rech kintzijoj ri utzij ri Dios.
Are kintzijoj ri awatal kan najtir ojer, qꞌij junabꞌ, kamik kꞌut xkꞌut chikiwach ri e tyoxalaj taq winaq.
Chike we winaq riꞌ ri Dios xraj xukꞌut ri ujuluwem rech ri uqꞌinomal ri awatal loq chikiwach ri man aꞌj Israel taj, are waꞌ ri Cristo ri kꞌo pa iwanimaꞌ ri kuꞌlibꞌal kuꞌx rech juluwem.
Are waꞌ ri Cristo ri kaqatzijoj chike ri winaq, keꞌqapixibꞌax, kaqakꞌut chikiwach rukꞌ etaꞌmabꞌal rech e tzꞌaqat keꞌqajacho pa Cristo.
Rumal waꞌ kinchakunik kinkoj nuchuqꞌabꞌ ri kinkꞌamawaꞌj che ri Cristo, ri kachakun pa wanimaꞌ.
Kawaj kiwetaꞌmaj chi sibꞌalaj tajin kintij chuqꞌabꞌ rumal iwe, xuqujeꞌ kumal ke ri e kꞌo pa ri tinimit Laodicea, xuqujeꞌ kumal ke e kꞌi ri winaq ri man ketaꞌm ta nuwach.
Kawaj chi kikꞌamawaꞌj ichuqꞌabꞌ, xa jun kibꞌano kixkꞌojiꞌ pa ri loqꞌanik, xuqujeꞌ kakꞌojiꞌ iwukꞌ ronojel qꞌinomal ri kape qas rukꞌ kuꞌlibꞌal kuꞌx xuqujeꞌ rukꞌ etaꞌmabꞌal. Rech kiwetaꞌmaj ri awatal loq rumal ri Dios, are waꞌ ri Cristo.
Pa Cristo awatal wi ronojel ri qꞌinomal rech ri etaꞌmabꞌal xuqujeꞌ ronojel noꞌj.
Kinbꞌij waꞌ chiꞌwe, rech maj jun kixsubꞌuw rukꞌ qꞌolobꞌal taq tzij.
Pune in maj iwukꞌ, ri wanimaꞌ kꞌo iwukꞌ, kinkiꞌkotik are kinwilo chi tajin kibꞌan ri jastaq pa ri ucholajil, xuqujeꞌ ko kꞌo ri ikojobꞌal pa Cristo.
Rumal kꞌu riꞌ, chixkꞌol pa ri Ajawxel Jesucristo, jacha ri xibꞌan chukꞌamawaꞌxik.
Chixjeqeloq xuqujeꞌ chixkꞌiy pa Cristo, qas chixkꞌol pa ri kojobꞌal jetaq ri xkꞌut chiꞌwach, xuqujeꞌ chixnoj che tyoxinik.
Chichajij iwibꞌ rech maj jun kixmenkꞌetinik rukꞌ chomanik rech ri uwachulew, ri kutereneꞌj ri kinaqꞌatajibꞌal ri winaq ri kꞌamtal kibꞌe rumal ri itzel uxlabꞌal, junam rukꞌ ri kikojonik ri winaq rech we uwachulew riꞌ, man je ta kꞌu riꞌ karaj ri Cristo.
Rumal cher ronojel ri kux ri Dios kꞌo pa Cristo pa ri utyoꞌjal jun winaq.
Ri ix kꞌut xixux tzꞌaqat pa Cristo, ri Areꞌ are jolomaj rech ronojel chuqꞌabꞌ xuqujeꞌ kwinem.
Xuqujeꞌ pa Cristo xkoj iwetal, man rukꞌ ta uqꞌabꞌ winaq, are xiya ri ityoꞌjal re makaj pa ri etal ri xubꞌan ri Cristo.
Are waꞌ ri xikꞌamawaꞌj are xixmuqiꞌ pa ri qasanaꞌ xuqujeꞌ xixkꞌastajik rumal ri ikojobꞌal pa ri ukwinem ri Dios, ri xukꞌastajisaj ri Cristo chkixoꞌl ri kaminaqibꞌ.
Are majaꞌ kakoj iwetal, ix kaminaq kanoq pa taq ri imak, ri Dios kꞌut xuya ikꞌaslemal pa junamam rukꞌ ri Cristo, are xukuy ronojel ri qamak.
Xuqujeꞌ xutoj ri qakꞌas ri kꞌo kanoq are waꞌ ri kutoqꞌij ri taqanik. Areꞌ xtojow ri qakꞌas ri ubꞌanom kꞌulel chaqe, xubꞌajij kan cho ri ripbꞌal.
Are xetukitaj ri chuqꞌabꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri e kwinem rumal, xuꞌya pa kikꞌixibal chikiwach konojel xchꞌeken pa kiwiꞌ cho ri ripbꞌal.
Rumal bꞌa riꞌ maj jun kuqꞌat tzij piꞌwiꞌ rumal ri kitijo xuqujeꞌ rumal ri kiqumuj, o rumal taq ri nimaqꞌij, rech ri kꞌakꞌ ikꞌ, xuqujeꞌ rech uxlanem.
Waꞌ we jastaq riꞌ xaq umuꞌjal ri jastaq ri kepe na, are kꞌu ri tyoꞌjal rech ri Cristo.
Man kiya ta bꞌa bꞌe chike we winaq ri kakijaluj kakimochꞌ kibꞌ chkiwach ri angelibꞌ xuqujeꞌ keꞌkiqꞌijilaꞌj. We winaq riꞌ kakiya ubꞌixik ri man kilom ta uwach xuqujeꞌ kakinimarisaj kibꞌ rukꞌ ri kichomanik rech uwachulew.
Man kakaj taj kakinukꞌ kibꞌ rukꞌ ri jolomaj. Rumal ri jolomaj ronojel ri tyoꞌjal uchapom ribꞌ xuqujeꞌ unakꞌom taq ribꞌ, tajin kakꞌiyik jetaq ri karaj ri Dios.
We ix kaminaq chi rukꞌ ri Cristo pa ri inoꞌjibꞌal rech ri uwachulew ¿jas kꞌu che kibꞌano chi je ri ix kꞌo ajuwachulew, kinim iwibꞌ chuxeꞌ ri taqanik ri kubꞌij
man chapo, matijo, man kachap ta we jastaq riꞌ?
We taqanik riꞌ xaq utaqanik xuqujeꞌ ukꞌutuꞌn winaq, ronojel kasach na uwach are kakojik.
Jer kꞌo noꞌjibꞌal che ri ubꞌiꞌtajik, xaq jalum utzilal, mochꞌochꞌem, xuqujeꞌ ri kꞌax che ri tyoꞌjal, maj kꞌu kutayij chuqꞌilik ri jiqꞌjatem rech ri bꞌanoj makaj.
We kꞌu xixkꞌastaj rukꞌ ri Cristo, are bꞌa chitzukuj ri jastaq rech chilaꞌ chikaj, jawjeꞌ ri tꞌuyul wi ri Cristo pa uwiqiqꞌabꞌ ri Dios.
Are chichomaj rij ri jastaq ri kꞌo chilaꞌ chikaj, man are ta ri kꞌo cho ri uwachulew,
ri ix ix kaminaq chik, ri ikꞌaslemal ix awatal rukꞌ Cristo pa Dios.
Are kukꞌut ribꞌ ri Cristo, ri ikꞌaslemal kixkꞌut na xuqujeꞌ rukꞌ areꞌ, pa ri ujuluwem.
Rumal riꞌ chibꞌana chi ri ityoꞌjal kaminaq chik chubꞌanik mak, chitzaqa kan ri bꞌanoj taq mak kukꞌ taq ixoqibꞌ xuqujeꞌ achyabꞌ, ri jastaq ri man e chꞌajchꞌoj taj, itzel taq irayinik, jiqꞌjatem, kajunumataj rukꞌ ri qꞌijilaꞌn taq jastaq ri man Dios taj.
Rumal taq we jastaq riꞌ kape ri royawal ri Dios pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq ri man keniman taj.
Are waꞌ kibꞌan taq kan nabꞌe, are ix muꞌl chupam ri mak.
Kamik kꞌut chitzaqa kan ronojel oyawal, chꞌuꞌjilal, etzelal, bꞌanoj taq tzij, xuqujeꞌ ubꞌixik itzel taq tzij.
Man kibꞌan ta bꞌanoj tzij chibꞌil taq iwibꞌ, rumal chi iwesam chi kan ri qꞌeꞌl taq atzꞌyaqibꞌal xuqujeꞌ ri ijiqꞌjatem.
Xuqujeꞌ ikojom chik ri kꞌakꞌ atzꞌyaqibꞌal rech ri kꞌakꞌ kꞌaslemal, ri kakꞌexkꞌobꞌik pa ri retaꞌmabꞌal ri ukaꞌyibꞌal ri tikol rech.
Pa we kꞌakꞌ kꞌaslemal riꞌ, man choqꞌaqꞌ taj we aꞌj Israel ri winaq o man aꞌj Israel taj, we okisatal retal o man okisatal taj, we kꞌo retaꞌmabꞌal o maj retaꞌmabꞌal, we tzoqopitalik o man tzoqopital taj, xane are ri Cristo ronojel, xuqujeꞌ kꞌo pa kanimaꞌ konojel.
Rumal kꞌu ri ixuchaꞌom apanoq ri Dios, ix tyoxalaj taq winaq xuqujeꞌ sibꞌalaj ix loqꞌ, chiwatzꞌyaqibꞌej bꞌa ri ubꞌanik toqꞌobꞌ, mochꞌochꞌem, utzilal, xuqujeꞌ kochꞌoj ibꞌ.
Rech kixkwinik kitoꞌ iwibꞌ, we kꞌo ne jun kuchꞌaꞌ ribꞌ che jun chik, chixkuyun bꞌa jetaq ri xubꞌan ri Ajawxel che ikuyik.
Pa uwiꞌ ronojel, chiwatzꞌyaqibꞌej ri loqꞌanik rumal areꞌ qas chapowinaq ronojel.
Are ri ujaꞌmaril ri Cristo, ri xixsikꞌinik rech kixux xa jun tyoꞌjal, bꞌana rech pa taq ri iwanimaꞌ, xuqujeꞌ chiya tyoxinik.
Are kꞌol ri utzij ri Cristo pa iwanimaꞌ, chipixabꞌaj iwibꞌ xuqujeꞌ chiya taq inoꞌj rukꞌ etaꞌmabꞌal, chibꞌixoj ri salmos, xuqujeꞌ chiya bꞌix pa ri Uxlabꞌixel che ri Dios rukꞌ tyoxinik pa taq iwanimaꞌ.
Ronojel kꞌu ri kibꞌano, we kꞌu xa kibꞌij o xane kibꞌano, chibꞌana pa ri ubꞌiꞌ ri Ajawxel Jesús, chixtyoxin che ri Tataxel rumal ri Cristo.
Kꞌulanik taq ixoqibꞌ, chiꞌnimaj ri iwachajilal, jacha ri taqal cho ri Dios.
Achajilom, chiꞌloqꞌaj ri iwixoqilal, man xaq ta kixkꞌankꞌat kukꞌ.
Alkꞌwaꞌlaxelabꞌ, chiꞌnimaj ri itat inan che ronojel ri kixkitaq wi, rumal chi are waꞌ kaqaj cho ri Ajawxel.
Tat nan, man kiyak ta koyawal ri iꞌwalkꞌwaꞌl, rech man kakꞌistaj ta kikꞌuꞌx.
Ajchakibꞌ, chiꞌnimaj ri iꞌwajaw rech ri uwachulew, man xaq xwi ta kixpatanijik are e kꞌo iwukꞌ, jetaq ri winaq ri kakaj keqaj chikiwach ri e winaq, xane chibꞌana rukꞌ rutzil iwanimaꞌ, kimochꞌ iwibꞌ cho ri Dios.
Ronojel kꞌu ri kibꞌano, chibꞌana rukꞌ rutzil iwanimaꞌ, rumal che ri Dios kibꞌan wi, man chike ta ri winaq.
Iwetaꞌm kꞌut chi are ri Ajawxel kayoꞌw ukꞌaxelal ri echabꞌal, rumal cher are kipatanij ri Cristo ri Ajawxel.
Are kꞌu ri man are ta kubꞌan ri sukꞌ, kukꞌamawaꞌj na ukꞌaxelal ri kubꞌano, rumal man xaq ta e kꞌyaqal ri kakikꞌamawaꞌj ri tojbꞌal rech ri kꞌaxal ri kakibꞌano.
Ri ix, ri ix ajchoqꞌe chak, chiya ri qas taqal chike ri iꞌwajchakibꞌ, qas tzꞌaqat chibꞌana che, naꞌtaj chiꞌwe chi kꞌo jun iwajaw pa ri kaj.
Are chiwilij ubꞌanik chꞌawem, chixjeqel chupam rukꞌ tyoxinik.
Chibꞌana xuqujeꞌ chꞌawem pa qawiꞌ rech kujaq ri Dios kꞌi kꞌolibꞌal rech kaqatzijoj ri utzij, ri rumal utzijoxik in tzꞌapil pa cheꞌ.
Chibꞌana chꞌawem rech qas kꞌyaqal kinbꞌan chutzijoxik, jacha ri kajawatajik.
Rukꞌ etaꞌmabꞌal chixnoꞌjin kukꞌ ri winaq ri man e kojonelabꞌ taj che ri Cristo, qas utz chibꞌana chukojik ri qꞌotaj.
Qas utz chibꞌana che ri itzijonem xuqujeꞌ qas kꞌo rumal chixtzijonoq. Rech iwetaꞌm jas kibꞌan chutzalixik uwach ri kitzij ri winaq chi kijujunal.
Ri loqꞌalaj qachalal Tíquico, sukꞌ patanijel xuqujeꞌ tobꞌanel pa ri Ajawxel, kutzijoj wa chiꞌwe qas jas je nubꞌanom.
Kintaq bꞌik iwukꞌ rech kito qas jeꞌ ri qabꞌanom jeriꞌ kikꞌamawaꞌj ichuqꞌabꞌ.
Keꞌ xuqujeꞌ ri Onésimo rukꞌ. Areꞌ jun iwachiꞌl ix. Kuꞌtzijoj waꞌ chiꞌwe jas ri tajin kakꞌulmataj waral.
Ri Aristarco ri wachiꞌl uj kꞌo pa cheꞌ kutaq rutzil iwach, xuqujeꞌ ri Marcos ri uprimo ri Bernabé. Are kꞌu we kixuꞌsolij ri Marcos, utz chibꞌana che ukꞌamawaꞌxik jetaq ri itaqkil yaꞌtalik.
Kutaq xuqujeꞌ rutzil iwach ri Jesús, ri kabꞌix Sukꞌ che, xaq xwi we oꞌxibꞌ winaq riꞌ aꞌj Israel ketobꞌan wukꞌ chuqꞌalajisaxik ri ajawarem rech ri Dios, kiyoꞌm kꞌu kꞌulibꞌal kuꞌx chwe.
Kutaq xuqujeꞌ rutzil iwach ri Epafras, jun iwachiꞌl. We patanil rech ri Jesucristo riꞌ, tajin kubꞌan uchuqꞌabꞌ kubꞌan chꞌawem piꞌwiꞌ, rech qas kuchap ikꞌuꞌx, kibꞌan ri rayibꞌal ukꞌuꞌx ri Dios.
Qas wilom chi areꞌ kok il rumal iwe, xuqujeꞌ kumal ke ri keꞌl pa ri tinimit Laodicea xuqujeꞌ kumal ri e kꞌo pa tinimit Hierápolis.
Kutaq xuqujeꞌ rutzil iwach ri Lucas, ri loqꞌalaj kunanel, xuqujeꞌ ri Demas.
Chitaqa rutzil kiwach ri alaxik ri e kꞌo pa ri tinimit Laodicea, xuqujeꞌ che ri Ninfas, xuqujeꞌ chike ri komontyox ri kꞌo cho rachoch.
Are kasikꞌitaj uwach we wuj riꞌ pa ijolom, sikꞌix xuqujeꞌ pa ri komontyox je laꞌ pa ri tinimit Laodicea, xuqujeꞌ chisikꞌij ix ri wuj ri taqtal bꞌik che ri komontyox riꞌ.
Chibꞌij che ri Arquipo are chubꞌana ri upatan ri xukꞌamawaꞌj che ri Ajawxel, are rilij ubꞌanik.
In in Pablo kintzꞌibꞌaj rukꞌ ri nuqꞌabꞌ xuqujeꞌ rukꞌ ri nutzꞌibꞌ. Naꞌtaj chiꞌwe chi in tzꞌapal pa cheꞌ. Are ri utoqꞌobꞌ ri Ajawxel kakanaj kan iwukꞌ.
Ri Pablo, ri Silvano xuqujeꞌ ri Timoteo, kakitaq rutzil kiwach konojel ri e komontyox ri e kꞌo pa ri Tataxel Dios xuqujeꞌ pa ri Ajawxel Jesucristo. Chikꞌamawaꞌj toqꞌobꞌ xuqujeꞌ jaꞌmaril.
Ronojel mul kujtyoxin che ri Dios rumal iwe, are kixnaꞌtaj chaqe pa ri qachꞌawem.
Amaqꞌel kixqanaꞌtaj cho ri Dios ri qatat rumal ri ichak ri ibꞌanom rukꞌ kojobꞌal, ri ichak ri xibꞌan rukꞌ loqꞌanik, xuqujeꞌ ri ikuꞌlibꞌal ikꞌuꞌx pa ri Ajawxel Jesucristo.
Loqꞌalaj taq alaxik rech ri Dios, qetaꞌm chi are ri Dios ix choꞌwinaq apanoq.
Jeriꞌ rumal man xwi ta xqatzijoj ri utzij ri Dios chiꞌwe rukꞌ taq tzij, xane qas kꞌyaqalik ri xqabꞌij chiꞌwe chi ri Tyoxalaj Uxlabꞌixel kachakun pa qanimaꞌ uj rech qas utz kaqabꞌan chubꞌixik ri tzij chiꞌwe.
Ri ix je xibꞌano jetaq ri xqabꞌan uj xuqujeꞌ jetaq ri xubꞌano ri Ajawxel, pune xiriq sibꞌalaj kꞌax xikꞌamawaꞌj rukꞌ kiꞌkotemal ri utz laj tzij ri kuya ri Tyoxalaj Uxlabꞌixel.
Rumal riꞌ xikꞌut chikiwach ri kojonelabꞌ aꞌj Macedonia xuqujeꞌ aꞌj Acaya jas ri usukꞌ ri jastaq.
Jeriꞌ rumal ri ix xitzijoj ri utzij ri Jesucristo, man xaq xwi ta pa Macedonia xuqujeꞌ pa Acaya xane pa ronojel kꞌolibꞌal. Ri winaq ri keꞌl chilaꞌ ketaꞌm chik chi ixkojoninaq che ri Dios, rumal riꞌ man choqꞌaqꞌ ta chik chi kaqabꞌij uj jun jastaq chik chike.
Tzi aꞌreꞌ ri winaq ketzijonik chi ix xujikꞌamawaꞌj xuqujeꞌ qas sukꞌ xkibꞌano aꞌreꞌ xekojon che ri Dios, xeꞌkitzaq kanoq ri e bꞌanom tyox xkichapleꞌj upatanixik ri kꞌaslik Dios.
Xuqujeꞌ kakibꞌij chi iwayeꞌm apanoq ri Jesús, ri uKꞌojol ri Dios, ri xukꞌastajisaj ri Dios chikixoꞌl ri kaminaqibꞌ, Areꞌ kujkolow na pa ri qꞌij are kaqꞌat na tzij pa kiwiꞌ konojel ri winaq.
Qachalal, ix iwetaꞌm chi qas kꞌo xupatanij ri solinik ri xqabꞌan iwukꞌ.
Xuqujeꞌ iwetaꞌm chi pune xbꞌan kꞌax chaqe je laꞌ pa ri tinimit Filipos, xqakꞌamawaꞌj qachuqꞌabꞌ pa Dios rumal riꞌ xqatzijoj ri utz laj tzij chiꞌwe.
